title: QA Analyst
description:
**About The Opportunity**
 We're looking for a skilled QA Analyst, Mobile Apps, to join our product\-focused, guest\-centric digital team. This role focuses on ensuring high\-quality mobile applications and digital experiences across multiple entertainment brands. Unlike standard QA pipelines, our workflow emphasizes both manual and automated testing, data\-driven insights, and continuous integration.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, maintain, and evolve the overall QA strategy for mobile applications, ensuring comprehensive test coverage through manual and automated testing.
* Collaborate with developers, product managers, and QA engineers to review requirements, define test plans, and prioritize test activities.
* Analyze testing outcomes to identify trends, common defects, and potential quality risks; provide actionable insights to improve product quality.
* Evaluate and recommend improvements in test automation efforts, identifying opportunities for efficiency and reliability.
* Support the integration of QA processes within the CI/CD pipeline, working closely with engineers to ensure early and continuous testing.
* Stay current with mobile testing tools, trends, and best practices, including strategies for intelligent automation and quality metrics.
* Troubleshoot production issues on live applications and communicate results effectively.
* Contribute to QA team processes and standards, making recommendations for improvements when necessary.


**Required Qualifications**
* Solid background in Quality Assurance or Software Testing for web and mobile applications.
* Experience working in collaborative, cross\-functional agile teams.
* Proven ability to test large\-scale consumer\-facing applications.
* Strong understanding of the software development lifecycle.
* Strong understanding of web\-based software architectures and technologies.
* Excellent written, verbal, and presentation skills.
* Proficiency with bug tracking, project/product management, and test management tools (e.g., Azure DevOps).
* Advanced/fluent English proficiency.


**Nice To Have Skills**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* QA or software testing certification(s).
* Experience in analyzing mobile testing efforts and creating detailed test plans and test cases.
* Exposure to test automation frameworks and CI/CD integration.
* Knowledge of troubleshooting production issues and providing data\-driven quality insights.
* Familiarity with intelligent automation strategies and QA metrics.

title: Engineering Manager
description:
**Welcome to Devlane!**

We are a dynamic software development company with a strong presence across Latin America. Currently, we specialize in offering staff augmentation services to clients worldwide, with a particular focus on North America.

Joining our team offers you the opportunity to shine and make a significant impact on the projects you work on. Many of our clients are modern small to medium\-sized businesses experiencing rapid growth, and they're eager to add core members like you to their teams. This environment ensures you'll stay up\-to\-date with the latest technology trends.

At Devlane, our values are straightforward: we foster a collaborative environment and prioritize building long\-lasting relationships where you can develop your skills as a software engineer and learn from your peers.

**What's the role about?**

You will assist in the planning, design, and supervision of projects, as well as in overseeing multiple engineering teams. You will be responsible for ensuring that engineering projects stay on track and are delivered on time, making sure teams have the resources they need, and coordinating work with other managers and staff.

**What do we require from you?**

1\. Technical Leadership \& Execution

* 5\+ years of software engineering experience, with at least 2 years in an engineering management or team lead role.
* Strong understanding of modern backend and frontend technologies (e.g., Node.js, TypeScript, React, PostgreSQL, AWS/GCP).
* Proven ability to manage multiple concurrent projects with complex dependencies.
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines, release management, and deployment best practices.
* Demonstrated ability to unblock teams and ensure delivery cadence is predictable and reliable.

**2\. People \& Team Management**

* Experience managing teams of 5–15 engineers across multiple projects.
* Skilled in sprint planning, standups, retrospectives, and ensuring process adherence without excessive bureaucracy.
* Proven ability to coach engineers, provide constructive feedback, and support career growth.
* Excellent communication — able to translate technical progress and blockers to product, design, and leadership stakeholders.
* Track record of fostering accountability, ownership, and proactive communication within teams.

**3\. Process \& Operational Excellence**

* Strong experience with Agile or hybrid process management, with an emphasis on data\-driven decision\-making.
* Familiar with metrics collection and reporting, e.g., DORA metrics, velocity tracking, or sprint performance analysis.
* Comfortable managing SEVs, support escalations (SUPs), and production incidents, ensuring end\-to\-end accountability and communication.
* Able to balance short\-term execution and long\-term technical quality.
* Experience setting and enforcing engineering standards, such as code review practices, testing coverage, and documentation quality.

**Some of our Perks:**

* Salary in USD.
* 100% Remote
* 25 days of Paid Time Off per year.
* 8\-hour workday, with flexible hours.
* Welcome kit from the brand.
* High\-end hardware provided: laptop, mouse, \& headphones.
* English classes, virtual library and online courses.
* Contribution bonuses

Ready to take the next step in your career?  
**Apply now!**

Job Types: Contract, Permanent

title: Engineering Manager, Credit Cycle
description:
**Company Description**  

Founded by experienced entrepreneurs and engineers in 2016, Pismo is a technology company that provides a comprehensive processing platform for banking, card issuing and financial market infrastructure and helps customers innovate and build the next generation of banking and payment solutions. Pismo joined Visa in 2024\.


Leveraging Visa’s solutions, our core platform, and an expanding suite of capabilities, Pismo addresses the technological challenges that large banks, marketplaces, and fintech companies face in migrating from legacy systems to more advanced technology in the market. Pismo’s cloud\-based platform empowers firms to build and launch financial products rapidly, scaling as they grow to have a broader audience while keeping high security and availability standards.


Pismo’s 500\+ employees are located in more than 10 countries around the world.

 **Job Description** **Summary**


The Engineering Manager for the Credit Cycle team will lead the development of core services that power Pismo’s credit lifecycle platform, enabling clients to offer revolving credit seamlessly and securely in a cloud\-native environment. This role demands a strong focus on security, scalability, observability, and reliability, as the team is responsible for mission\-critical components such as invoice closure, account debt control, and financial transaction integrity.  

The ideal candidate will combine technical leadership, architectural vision, and people management skills to guide the team through complex engineering challenges and deliver high\-quality, resilient solutions while fostering a culture of excellence, innovation, and continuous improvement.

**What you will do**

* Lead and mentor a team of engineers, fostering a collaborative and high\-performance environment.
* Hire and onboard technical talent aligned with company culture and team goals.
* Own the technical vision and architecture for credit lifecycle management and invoice processing services.
* Ensure system stability, data integrity, and scalability in financial transactions.
* Manage multiple development initiatives, including planning, prioritization, resource allocation, and execution using Agile methodologies.
* Implement and enforce best practices for software development, including coding standards, code reviews, automated testing, and CI/CD.
* Maintain rigorous security standards and compliance with regulations such as PCI DSS and LGPD.
* Collaborate with product managers, architects, and stakeholders to align technical solutions with business requirements.
* Communicate plans, progress, risks, and technical decisions clearly and consistently to stakeholders.
* Lead production support and incident response, ensuring rapid resolution and minimal client impact.
* Establish and maintain robust observability practices, including metrics, distributed tracing, and log aggregation, to meet SLOs and SLAs.


This is a remote position. A remote position does not require job duties be performed within proximity of a Visa office location. Remote positions may be required to be present at a Visa office with scheduled notice.

 **Qualifications**  

* For this role, you must be based in Brazil

**Language Skills:**

* Proficiency in English at B2 level (Upper\-Intermediate).

**Technical Skills:**

* Minimum of 3 years managing high\-performing engineering teams.
* Strong self\-motivation and adaptability in dynamic environments.
* Excellent analytical, problem\-solving, and communication skills.
* Ability to make assertive decisions under pressure and navigate complex constraints.
* Minimum of 7 years of experience in software development as a software engineer, with significant experience in Java.
* Ability to work independently in a remote, multicultural team environment.
* Strong background in Agile methodologies (Kanban, Scrum).
* Strong knowledge of relational databases and SQL.
* Experience developing secure and scalable microservices.
* Experience with event\-driven architecture.
* Experience with performance testing and monitoring tools.
* Technical expertise in Java and/or Golang, AWS, Terraform, containerization, testing, and code reviewing.

**Basic Qualifications**

* Bachelor’s Degree in a relevant field with 5\+ years of relevant work experience.
* Advanced Degree (e.g., Master’s, MBA, JD, MD) with at least 2 years of relevant work experience.
* PhD with no prior work experience required.
* Alternatively, 8\+ years of relevant work experience without a formal degree.

**Preferred Qualifications**

* Knowledge in payments or financial services industry.
* Knowledge in Azure or Google Cloud Platform.
* Knowledge in Golang.

  

**Additional Information**  

Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title: PDI SW - Pessoa Líder Técnica II (Web, Mobile e Servidor)
Especialista em Geração e Gestão de Massa de Testes
description:
Estamos em busca de uma pessoa Especialista em Geração e Gestão de Massa de Testes para atuar em ambiente corporativo de grande porte, apoiando iniciativas de qualidade de software, automação de testes e garantia de dados.

  

Esse(a) profissional será responsável por planejar, gerar, manter e gerenciar massas de dados para os diferentes tipos de testes (funcionais, de integração, automação, desempenho e regressão), assegurando confiabilidade, rastreabilidade e anonimização das informações utilizadas.

 **Local de Trabalho:** Modelo híbrido – São Paulo (SP), Rio de Janeiro (RJ) ou Brasília (DF)

 **Responsabilidades e atribuições**  

* Planejar e executar estratégias de geração, versionamento e manutenção de massas de testes.
* Definir e aplicar critérios de anonimização, mascaramento e integridade de dados utilizados em ambientes de testes.
* Apoiar as equipes de QA e desenvolvimento na obtenção e gestão de dados consistentes e seguros.
* Criar e administrar scripts, consultas e rotinas de banco de dados para carga, transformação e limpeza de massas de teste.
* Garantir que as massas de teste estejam alinhadas com os cenários de negócio e regras funcionais.
* Apoiar a automação de testes e os pipelines de CI/CD com dados gerados sob demanda.
* Monitorar o uso e a validade das massas de dados, identificando inconsistências e propondo melhorias.
* Elaborar relatórios e indicadores de qualidade dos dados utilizados em testes.

  

**Requisitos e qualificações**  

* Experiência com **bancos de dados relacionais** (Oracle, SQL Server, DB2, PostgreSQL).
* Conhecimento em **criação e manipulação de dados via SQL, scripts e ferramentas de ETL**.
* Vivência com **máscaras de dados e anonimização** (Data Masking, Data Subsetting).
* Experiência em **ambientes de testes integrados** e múltiplas plataformas (mainframe, web, mobile).
* Conhecimento em **automação de testes e integração com pipelines de CI/CD**.
* Capacidade de diagnosticar falhas e inconsistências em dados de ambientes de teste.

**Desejáveis:**
---------------

* Experiência com **ferramentas de gestão de massa de dados** (Informatica TDM, IBM Optim, Delphix, etc.).
* Conhecimento em **ferramentas de versionamento e repositórios de dados** (Git, Bitbucket).
* Vivência em **ambientes de alta criticidade** e grandes volumes de dados.
* Certificações em **bancos de dados, QA ou gestão de dados**.

  

**Informações adicionais**  

* Remuneração competitiva com base na experiência;
* Possibilidade de crescimento na empresa e de participação em projetos estratégicos;
* Ambiente de trabalho dinâmico e desafiador;
* Oportunidade de trabalhar em uma empresa do mercado em plena expansão.

  

A Extractta nasceu com o propósito de transformar tecnologia em resultados reais para empresas de diversos segmentos. Ao longo da nossa trajetória, nos consolidamos como uma consultoria de inovação e tecnologia que une estratégia, pessoas e soluções digitais para apoiar organizações em seus desafios de crescimento e transformação.  



  

Atuamos em diferentes frentes, desde a inovação e transformação digital até a gestão de projetos e operações, apoiando empresas a alcançarem resultados excepcionais por meio de eficiência, inteligência de processos e adaptação contínua. Também nos destacamos pela consultoria especializada que ajuda nossos parceiros a evoluírem em cultura digital, comunicação, dados e novas tecnologias, além de estabelecermos parcerias globais que nos permitem levar as melhores soluções ao ecossistema de nossos clientes, tudo isso com um time especializado!

  

Na Extractta, acreditamos que o diferencial está nas pessoas. Por isso, investimos em um ambiente colaborativo, inovador e aberto, onde cada talento tem espaço para aprender, crescer e fazer parte de projetos desafiadores que realmente transformam negócios. Se você busca uma empresa em constante evolução, apaixonada por tecnologia e que valoriza o desenvolvimento de seus colaboradores, o seu lugar pode ser aqui. Junte\-se à Extractta e venha construir o futuro conosco.

title: Senior Software Engineer - Indaiatuba/SP
Lead Engineer-Control System
description:
**Job Description Summary**
===========================


Systems engineering is a cross\-functional engineering discipline centered on an approach, mindset, and process. All activities that consider both the business and the technical needs of the customers with the goal of providing a quality product that meets the users needs. The discipline that executes a robust process of design, creation, and optimization of systems, consisting of identification and quantification of system requirements, creation of alternate system design concepts, performance of design trade studies, selection and implementation of the best designs and verification that the design is properly integrated and executed. Process that proceeds from concept to production to operation.
  

Accountable for the quality of own work. Subject to direct operations supervision/prescribed work instructions/systems checking. Executes within a well\-defined operations framework. There is generally a step by step sequence of standard operational tasks which need to be followed to achieve an end result.**Job Description**
===================

**About Position**


As a Lead Engineer Control System, you will be responsible for project execution activities on Control System design and working for Hydro Control System COE.


You will work autonomously and deliver as directed and under supervision of the Main Package Engineer (MPE, Control System COE) for the project or by the Control System Engineering Manager.


You will perform hardware and software design of the various hydro Control system packages for one or more projects, on own DCS or on 3rd party control solutions.

**Role \& Responsibilities**


Work on power plant control system design deliverables, networking and cybersecurity solutions involving PLC, IO devices, Server configuration and deployment, network architectures, switch configuration and trouble shooting. Install and configure servers, network managed Switches, Routers \& Firewalls, etc., for a power plant control environment (usually Rockwell, Mark VIe control system). Should be able to define VLANs \& Network segmentation. Read processing notice, create Functional Analysis documents and perform SW programming, logics, creation of static and dynamic mimics as per P\&ID and standard faceplates using Automation design tools (RS Logix, Studio 5000, FT View, Control ST, Cimplicity, Workstation ST, etc.), HMI configuration, Alarm display, etc., simulation testing of software. Perform Soft IO configuration for standard communication protocols prevailing in the industry (Modbus, IEC61850, IEC60870\-104, DNP 3, etc.). Perform interlocking design, wiring principles, etc. testing of control panels at GE Vernova workshop or supplier premises, support FAT, etc. Implement secure design practices in system design and software programming. Day\-to\-day activities include, but not limited to \-

* Perform contract analysis, concept design, reverse engineering, prepare work\-statement document.
* Document technical data generated for the assigned project.
* Review supplier documents (IO list, P\&ID, Minfex data of partners) and prepare/update IO list.
* Create supplier technical specification for BTS or BTP DCS solution, coordinate with suppliers \& do technical follow up.
* Prepare/update Logic programs, HMI mimics views as per P\&ID and standard faceplates.
* Perform design reviews as per plan, record outcomes and track actions till closure.
* Prepare and update OMM document.
* Track project schedule and implementation plan.


Other job needs \-

* Undertake occasional short\-term travel to customer and supplier premises for technical discussions, design follow\-up, testing, FAT, etc.
* Perform Site Survey activities, mapping existing systems and compile design inputs.
* Prepare de\-commissioning and dismantling needs (manuals) for the system.


Nature of Products/Projects – Power plant control system (BTS or BTP) Partnership – This role calls for cross\-functional interface, positioned on control design, with coordination with several process partners and customers. Collaborations include, but not limited to, interface within Engineering functions including Product development (NPI), Supply Chain and Customer facing organizations. Personal responsibilities –

* Deliver trainings programs to internal and external customers.
* Work on quality \& productivity improvement and cost\-out actions.
* Perform interface engineering, Site Support.
* Development of standards and design practice guides and use in project.
* Collaborate seamlessly with local and global teams on project execution activities.

**Qualifications**


Bachelor of Engineering Degree in Electrical/Electronics/Instrumentation/Control from accredited college or university. Controls Engineering experience with relevant experience in PLC hardware design and software programming. Should be aware of applicable standards and best practices in DCS design, including HW design, SW logic and User interface (HMI) design, control cubicle design and cybersecurity solutions. Should be aware global Cybersecurity standards such as IEC62443 \& NERC\-CIP. Tools Expertise – Rockwell Automation/ Mark VIe/Siemens/ABB/Emerson, etc. based Control System tools (RS Logix, Studio 5000, FT View, Control ST, Cimplicity, Workstation ST, SCALA, SICAM) Preferred industry experience – Power, Large EPC, Oil \& Gas. Strong English and Portuguese language skills (both oral and written).

**Desirable**


Working experience on Rockwell Automation or Mark VIe based Control System is preferred, however similar experience on other reputed DCS systems like Siemens, ABB, Emerson, etc. is acceptable. Candidate with exposure in Cybersecurity domain will be an advantage. Able to manage and resolve conflicts in a fast\-paced project execution environment. Clearly communicate and listen. Guide and motivate fellow team members.

**What Do We Offer?**

* Environment: A multicultural \& diverse environment with an enthusiastic team and supportive leaders. We have a pleasant and modern work infrastructure at our offices.
* Opportunities: We offer career growth opportunities, professional and personal trainings
* Benefits: We offer a competitive salary with multiple benefits like subsidized meals, medical, accidental \& life insurance coverage. We provide home office opportunity and flexible working hours (subject to business and HR approval)

**Work model:** Hybrid (3days office)

**Inclusion \& Diversity:** At GE Vernova, we believe in the value of your unique identity, background, and experiences. We are committed to fostering an inclusive culture, where everyone feels empowered to do their best work because they feel accepted, respected and that they belong.


Please click here to learn more: www.gevernova.com/sustainability/thrive

**Additional Information**
==========================

**Relocation Assistance Provided:** No

title: Tech Recruiter -
description:
Atrair, engajar e selecionar talentos de tecnologia que elevem o nível técnico e cultural da GOW, garantindo processos de recrutamento modernos, eficientes e centrados na experiência humana. O objetivo não é apenas preencher vagas , é construir times fortes, diversos e alinhados aos valores da empresa.

  



* Conduzir processos de **Recrutamento Seleção tech** de ponta a ponta (A a Z).
* Criar e executar estratégias de **hunting ativo**, principalmente via LinkedIn Recruiter, comunidades, eventos e networking.
* Realizar entrevistas **técnicas e comportamentais**, com foco em senioridade, competências e fit cultural.
* Trabalhar lado a lado com **Tech Leads, Product Owners, CTO, Squad Leaders e People Culture** para entender necessidades reais do time.
* Elaborar e validar **Job Descriptions** claras, objetivas e alinhadas à cultura GOW.
* Construir e manter o **Talent Pool Tech**, garantindo mapeamento constante de novos talentos.
* Desenvolver estratégias para **diversidade, inclusão e employer branding**.
* Calibrar perfis e apoiar a definição de **avaliações técnicas, testes práticos e desafios**.
* Garantir **excelência na comunicação com candidatos**, mantendo experiências humanas, transparentes e respeitosas.
* Acompanhar e reportar **métricas de recrutamento** (time\-to\-hire, SLAs, conversões, origem de candidatos, custos, qualidade de contratação).
* Contribuir para evolução dos processos internos de TA, trazendo tendências, ferramentas e boas práticas do mercado.

**Requisitos Técnicos**
**Obrigatórios:**


* Experiência prévia sólida como **Tech Recruiter / Talent Acquisition Specialist** (mín. 2 anos).
* Vivência com **hunting tech**, triagem, entrevistas comportamentais e técnicas.
* Conhecimento dos principais **stacks, linguagens e perfis** de tecnologia (JS, TS, Java, Python, DevOps, Cloud, QA, Mobile etc.).
* Experiência com ferramentas de recrutamento (LinkedIn Recruiter, ATS, plataformas como Gupy, Solides, Breezy, Greenhouse etc.).
* Entendimento de metodologias ágeis e dos principais papéis tech (PO, SM, Dev, QA, TL, Arquiteto).

**Desejáveis:**


* Experiência em consultorias ou empresas de tecnologia.
* Conhecimento em People Analytics / métricas de RS.
* Inglês intermediário ou avançado para seleção global.
* Vivência com vagas internacionais ou para clientes estrangeiros.

**Soft Skills e Cultura GOW:**
* **Transparência Radical:** comunica com clareza, alinhamento e verdade.
* **Colaboração acima do Ego:** trabalha junto com tech, negócios e pessoas sem fricção.
* **Empatia Assertiva:** cuida da experiência do candidato sem deixar de aplicar avaliação crítica.
* **Agilidade com Propósito:** velocidade sem perder qualidade.
* **Foco em Entregar Valor:** prioriza o que faz diferença para o time e para o cliente.
* **Autonomia com Alinhamento:** toma decisões com responsabilidade e contexto.
* **Abertura ao Feedback Contínuo:** busca evoluir e refinar técnicas de entrevista e hunting.

**O que oferecemos:**
* Participação ativa na construção do time tech da GOW.
* Cultura leve, colaborativa e com alto nível de autonomia.
* Acesso a programas de desenvolvimento (GOW Academy, Lightning Talks, mentoria).
* Ambiente com alto grau de aprendizado e troca com especialistas.
* Flexibilidade e respeito ao equilíbrio vida\-trabalho.
* Crescimento profissional e possibilidade de atuar em projetos estratégicos.

title: Analista de produto pl | product owner
Senior Quality Engineer - Eng Qualidade Sr. - Cajamar/SP
Quality Assurance (QA)
description:
It’s an exciting time to join Superbet, we’re entering new markets, developing new technologies, and moving step by step towards our goal of exciting the world. As our business grows, the number of exciting people initiatives grows with it, and we’re looking for a new colleague to partner with our team to bring these to life.
   

  

**Job Summary:**
 We’re looking for a
 **Quality Assurance Analyst** 
 to make sure our BPO partners deliver top\-notch support. You’ll monitor chats, emails, and voice interactions, provide insights, and help improve processes. This role also includes supporting training initiatives and collaborating with operational managers to enhance overall customer
   

  

* This position is for work in Sao Paulo\*


**We're looking for someone with:**
* Experience in customer service quality assurance, BPO management, or related fields; relevant studies or experience are also considered
* Familiarity with performance metrics for BPOs and multi\-channel service evaluation.
* Strong writing skills for clear, concise, and customer\-friendly knowledge base content that follows Superbet’s brand style.
* Intermediate English (B1\+) and experience with CRM tools like Zendesk.
* Comfortable using AI tools and automation to enhance quality assessment.
* Analytical, detail\-oriented, proactive, and collaborative, with solid problem\-solving skills.


**What you'll be doing:**
* Evaluate customer interactions across chat, email, and voice to ensure BPO partners meet performance metrics.
* Give actionable feedback to operational managers to improve service quality.
* Analyze trends in performance and suggest process improvements.
* Support training and development initiatives for BPO teams.
* Ensure consistent, high\-quality service across all customer channels.
* Use automation and AI tools to increase evaluation efficiency and insight accuracy.


**About Superbet Group**
 Superbet is a global tech and entertainment company committed to delivering thrilling, technology\-driven, sports betting and gaming experiences to millions of customers worldwide. Established in 2008, in Romania, the Group operates in over 12 countries, with key markets in Romania, Belgium, Poland, Serbia, and Brazil.
   

  

 Superbet’s ambitious growth strategy currently focuses on expanding across Europe and Latin America while delivering immersive customer experiences and redefining ways to connect with its audience. Across international markets, the Group’s global expansion strategy is driven by innovation, responsible technology, and a passion for supporting iconic sports clubs and athletes.
   

  

**Global Recognition and Standards**
 In 2019, Blackstone Inc., the world’s largest private equity firm, recognized Superbet’s vision and achievements with a strategic minority investment of €175 million. In 2025, the company further strengthened its financial position through a 1\.3 billion Euro refinancing agreement, reinforcing its partnerships with Blackstone and certain funds and accounts managed by HPS Investment Partners, paving the way for an accelerated global growth.
   

  

 As a leader in compliance and best practices, Superbet Group is an active member of the International Betting Integrity Association (IBIA) and the European Betting \& Gaming Association (EGBA).

title: Senior Full-Stack TypeScript Engineer (React, Node, TypeScript, AWS)
description:
**Join us at Provectus as part of a team** dedicated to building cutting\-edge technology solutions that have a positive impact on society. Our company specializes in AI and ML technologies, cloud services, and data engineering, and we take pride in our ability to innovate and push the boundaries of what's possible.  


### **Requirements:**

* Strong TypeScript knowledge — including interfaces, generics, unions, utility types, and strict typing mode.
* Solid React experience with hooks and modern state management (React Query, Zustand, etc.)
* Proficiency in UI component libraries (Chakra UI, shadcn/ui, MUI, or similar)
* Backend development experience using TypeScript on Node.js runtime, with frameworks such as Express, Fastify, or Nest
* Solid understanding of API design principles (REST, JSON schema validation, error handling)
* Strong testing mindset — confident with unit and integration testing (Jest, Vitest)
* Experience with ORMs (Prisma, TypeORM, Sequelize, etc.) and raw SQL when needed
* Hands\-on experience deploying and maintaining services on AWS (Lambda, ECS, S3\)
* Familiarity with AWS data and messaging services (RDS, DynamoDB, SQS, Cognito) is a strong plus
* Basic understanding of CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI)
* Active use of AI\-assisted developer tools (Cursor, Copilot, Claude Code, Gemini Code Assist)
* Strong Git fundamentals and team collaboration practices (PR reviews, clean commits)
* Excellent communication skills and ownership mindset

### **Nice to have:**

* Understanding of Python with FastAPI (SQLAlchemy, Pydantic, Alembic)
* Familiarity with OpenAPI / Swagger and schema generation tools (HeyAPI, openapi\-typescript)
* Experience with Infrastructure\-as\-Code (Terraform, AWS CDK)
* Knowledge of containerization (Docker, docker\-compose)
* Familiarity with API schema design (REST, GraphQL, OpenAPI)

### **Responsibilities:**

* Develop well\-structured, testable, and efficient code using modern software engineering practices
* Collaborate closely with product owners, designers, and fellow engineers to deliver high\-quality features
* Take ownership of deliverables while working in a small agile team (4–5 developers
* Optimize performance and maintain clean architecture in both frontend and backend components.
* Build and maintain RESTful APIs and services deployed on AWS (Lambda, ECS, S3\)
* Participate in code reviews, ensuring quality, maintainability, and consistency across projects
* Implement unit and integration testing strategies (Jest, Vitest)
* Contribute to team documentation, reusable libraries, and coding standards
* Stay up to date with the latest web and cloud technologies (TypeScript ecosystem, AWS, AI\-assisted development)

### **What we offer:**

* Long\-term B2B engagement
* Self\-development budget for e\-learning, webinars, and conferences
* Unlimited AWS certification support
* Private medical insurance
* Fully remote setup
* International team of experienced engineers
* Career development plans and opportunities
* Flexible working hours



We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

title: Senior Business Intelligence Engineer, 3P LatAm Business Intelligence
description:
**DESCRIPTION**
---------------


Are you looking for a new challenge in a fast\-paced, innovative company? Come make history in Amazon’s LATAM team! We are looking for talented Business Intelligence Engineer for Amazon Marketplace. Amazon strives to be Earth's most customer\-centric company, where people can find and discover virtually anything they want to buy online. Over 2 million sellers in 10 countries list their products for sale on the Amazon Marketplace. Sellers are a critical part of Amazon’s ecosystem to deliver on our vision of offering the Earth’s largest selection and lowest prices.  

  

As a Business Intelligence Engineer, you will lead the design, implementation, and delivery of BI solutions in the complex and ambiguous problem space that is Amazon's marketplace. The ideal candidate will be a self\-starter, highly analytical, comfortable diving deep, and making data driven decisions with a strong business acumen. You must be able to handle competing priorities and manage stakeholders, setting up a BI roadmap for the topics you own and deliver on that roadmap. Your work will directly impact our ability to make data\-driven decisions and drive the success of our business.  

  

Key job responsibilities  

* Learn and understand a broad range of Amazon’s data resources and know how, when, and which to use.
* Work closely with the team to understand business challenges and provide data/analysis for better decision making.
* Design and create the reports and metrics for tracking business and product success.
* Build self\-service reporting platforms, establishing automated processes for large scale data analyzis.
* Understand and write high quality SQL queries to retrieve and analyze data.
* Extract, Transform and Load data to build new reporting solutions.
* Manage the local data infra\-structure, as well as work with Global teams to assure data is consistent and accurate.

  

About the team  

LATAM Marketplace BI team is responsible for ensuring our stakeholders and leaders have the data they need to make data\-driven decisions and drive the success of our business.  

We are structured into verticals (business topics) and promote knowledge sharing in between those topics every week.
  

In our team, a Business Intelligence Engineer can be responsible for 1 or more business verticals, driving his BI projects end to end, this involves: setting up the BI roadmap, managing stakeholders, diving deep on data for that topic and designing and building SQL Tables, KPIs, reports, dashboards and analysis.**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------

* Experience in scripting for automation (e.g. Python) and advanced SQL skills.
* Experience with data visualization using Tableau, Quicksight, or similar tools
* Experience working directly with business stakeholders to translate between data and business needs
* Experience building measures and metrics, and developing reporting solutions
* Experience managing, analyzing and communicating results to senior leadership

**PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS**
----------------------------

* Experience using Cloud Storage and Computing technologies such as AWS Redshift, S3, Hadoop, etc.
* Knowledge of data warehousing and data modeling
* Experience with statistical analytics and programming languages such as R, Python, Ruby, etc.
* Master's degree in statistics, data science, or an equivalent quantitative field

  

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how\-we\-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.

title: Product Owner Sênior - Jornada de Integrações
description:
Somos uma empresa em plena expansão no setor de iGaming e apostas esportivas, atuando de forma estratégica e integrada para fortalecer marcas de destaque nesse mercado. Com uma operação sólida e em constante crescimento, buscamos consolidar nossa posição entre as principais companhias de entretenimento digital do país.


Nosso propósito é oferecer experiências de entretenimento seguras, inovadoras e de alta qualidade, conectando tecnologia, paixão pelo esporte e compromisso com a excelência. Mantemos um forte compromisso com boas práticas de governança corporativa, baseadas em transparência, responsabilidade e sustentabilidade do negócio.


Acreditamos que o Jogo Responsável vai além das exigências regulatórias é um valor que orienta nossas decisões e iniciativas sociais. Nossa cultura valoriza as pessoas como o principal ativo da organização, estimulando o desenvolvimento de talentos e promovendo um ambiente de colaboração, bem\-estar e alto desempenho.


**O que você irá fazer:**


Atuar como principal ponto de contato entre as áreas de negócio e os times de desenvolvimento; Colaborar na definição e gestão do backlog do produto, garantindo priorização baseada em valor para o negócio e usabilidade; Trabalhar em conjunto com times multidisciplinares para o desenvolvimento e melhoria contínua dos produtos; Auxiliar no alinhamento de stakeholders internos e externos, garantindo a comunicação eficiente das estratégias e prioridades; Apoiar na gestão do roadmap de produto e contribuir para a execução eficaz das entregas; Participar de descobertas, sobre o usuário, através de alinhamentos junto a equipe, a fim de incluir possíveis melhorias na esteira de desenvolvimento; Analisar métricas de desempenho de produto, identificar oportunidades de melhoria e inovação, sempre com foco na entrega de valor ao cliente.


**O que você precisa ter:**


Ensino superior completo em Tecnologia da Informação, Engenharia, Administração ou áreas correlatas.


Experiência como Product Owner Sênior.


Habilidade comprovada em priorização de backlog e alinhamento com stakeholders internos e externos.


Habilidade de lidar com times multidisciplinares, facilitando a comunicação entre a área de produto, desenvolvimento, design e outras áreas da empresa.


Experiência prática com metodologias ágeis (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe e/ou outras).


Experiência em construção e análise de métricas de produto.


Experiência no uso de ferramentas como, ClickUp, Jira, Azure e/ou similares.


Habilidade de comunicação e capacidade de negociação com times multidisciplinares.


**Diferenciais:**


Experiência em empresas do segmento de iGaming.


Experiência com modelos de negócios baseados em APIs e ecossistema de integrações entre sistemas e plataformas whitelabel.


Experiência em integrações com meios de pagamento, anti\-fraude, CRM, entre outros.


Familiaridade com ferramentas de análise de dados, como Google Analytics, Mixpanel ou Amplitude.


Experiência na condução de testes A/B e pesquisas qualitativas e quantitativas.


Certificações na área de Produtos, como CSPO, PM3, Tera, ou equivalentes.


Inglês técnico para leitura e comunicação com equipes internacionais.

title: Via brasil br 163 - técnico em automação
Técnico de Qualidade Jr. - QA (Time Prosoft Fiscal)
Associate Product Manager
QA Analyst - Global Project (Fluent English)
description:
**Job Requirements**  

A NTT DATA Inc. é uma empresa multinacional de tecnologia que integra, dentre seus serviços, o desenvolvimento de software, segurança, cloud e, principalmente, infraestrutura de TI. Estamos, segundo o Great Place to Work, dentre as melhores empresas de Tecnologia para se trabalhar no Brasil. Temos uma cultura de trabalho inclusiva e prezamos muito pela liberdade de melhorar processos, pela flexibilidade e pelo respeito às pessoas!


Para que juntos possamos fazer grandes coisas, a NTT DATA Inc. acredita e apoia a diversidade em sua totalidade. Dessa forma, nossa empresa é aberta para todos, independentemente de deficiência, gênero, orientação sexual, raça, etnia, idade, origem ou estética.

  

Buscamos Pessoa de testes QA Pleno para equipe internacional atuando em ambiente totalmente remoto, robusto e dinâmico, com foco em garantir a qualidade das nossas soluções de integração, automação e processamento de dados.

  

**Time 100% remoto, alinhado ao fuso dos EUA (GMT\-5, 2h de diferença em relação BRT)**


️ **Inglês avançado necessário para rotina (reuniões e documentação)**

 **Work Experience**  

**Quais serão suas responsabilidades?**

* Execução de testes funcionais, de integração e regressão
* Desenvolvimento e manutenção de testes automatizados com Playwright
* Testes de APIs utilizando Insomnia
* Validação de compatibilidade entre navegadores com BrowserStack

 **O que esperamos que você possua?**

* Experiência consolidada em QA com foco em automação
* Conhecimentos em SQL básico para validações de dados
* Familiaridade com ferramentas de gestão como Jira
* Inglês avançado \- terá contato diário com equipes globais

 **Como você pode se destacar?**

* Experiência com metodologias ágeis
* Conhecimento em CI/CD
* Vivência com testes em dispositivos móveis
* Certificações na área de QA ou testes de software

title: Arquiteto(a) de Dados Sênior
description:
**Estamos buscando uma pessoa arquiteta de dados para o Time Vetta!**

  

Buscamos uma pessoa profissional sênior, com perfil hands\-on, sólida formação em tecnologia e experiência comprovada em arquitetura e engenharia de dados no ecossistema Microsoft. Essa pessoa será responsável por definir soluções robustas e escaláveis, além de atuar diretamente no desenvolvimento e na implementação de pipelines, integrações e modelos de dados.

  

O(a) arquiteto(a) terá o papel de estabelecer processos definitivos, padronizar práticas de desenvolvimento conforme as melhores práticas, estruturar MLOps e implantar um modelo de governança alinhado à plataforma Microsoft. Valorizamos excelente comunicação, capacidade analítica e foco em performance, segurança e governança de dados.

 **VOCÊ JÁ CONHECE A VETTA?**


Na Vetta, acreditamos que a tecnologia e a inovação são essenciais para criar um futuro mais sustentável e eficiente para todos. Como uma empresa líder em digitalização industrial, nossas soluções estão ajudando clientes em todo o mundo a reduzir o consumo de energia, a melhorar a eficiência operacional e apoiar a transição energética através da descarbonização.

  

Ao se juntar à nossa equipe, você terá a oportunidade de trabalhar em **projetos emocionantes e desafiadores com alguns dos maiores especialistas da indústria**. Além disso, você fará parte de uma equipe dedicada em gerar um impacto positivo no mundo e em ajudar nossos clientes a alcançar seus objetivos de negócios. O Time Vetta sabe a importância do trabalho em equipe e da colaboração para alcançar resultados que atingem todo o globo – ao mesmo tempo que **a carreira de cada um é transformada.**

 **Se você quer compartilhar a sua perspectiva para um mundo mais sustentável, venha ser parte do Time Vetta!**

 **Responsabilidades e atribuições** **Nesse time, você terá a oportunidade de:**

  

* Implantar e operacionalizar MLOps (ciclo de vida de modelos, monitoramento, rastreabilidade e governança), garantindo qualidade e confiabilidade em produção.
* Publicar aplicações e pipelines conforme melhores práticas, estruturando ambientes (DEV/QA/PRD), critérios de liberação e trilhas de rollback.
* Ser referência técnica, conduzindo alinhamentos, code reviews, mentoria e workshops para elevar maturidade técnica dos times.
* Projetar, desenvolver e implementar soluções de dados robustas, escaláveis e seguras no ecossistema Microsoft, cobrindo arquitetura, integração, processamento, armazenamento e análise.
* Definir arquitetura alvo (Data Lake / Lakehouse) e padronizar práticas de desenvolvimento (versionamento, revisão de código, testes, promoção entre ambientes).
* Definir e auxiliar na implementação de modelo de governança de dados corporativa, alinhado a frameworks de mercado (ex.: DAMA\-DMBOK), incluindo papéis e responsabilidades (data owner/steward), conselhos de governança, políticas e padrões corporativos.
* Estruturar e operacionalizar processos de qualidade de dados, glossário e dicionário de dados corporativos, taxonomias, linhagem e metadados, além de indicadores e SLAs/SLOs de dados.
* Modelar dados (relacional e dimensional), definir fluxos e integrações, com foco em desempenho, escalabilidade e custos.
* Estabelecer e disseminar padrões de governança e segurança de dados aderentes ao portfólio Microsoft, abrangendo políticas de acesso, conformidade e auditoria.
* Monitorar desempenho de sistemas e pipelines, identificando gargalos e liderando iniciativas de otimização e automação.
* Avaliar e recomendar abordagens dentro do portfólio Microsoft, assegurando aderência às necessidades do negócio e às diretrizes de arquitetura corporativa.
* Documentar arquiteturas, fluxos, decisões técnicas e boas práticas, mantendo repositórios e artefatos sempre atualizados.

 **Requisitos e qualificações** **O que esperamos de você para essa vaga:**

  

* Formação: Ensino Superior completo em Ciência da Computação, Sistemas de Informação, Engenharia de Software, Engenharia de Dados ou área relacionada.
* Experiência comprovada com plataformas de dados Microsoft (Azure) e seu ecossistema para ingestão, processamento, armazenamento, análise e orquestração.
* Experiência com MLOps no ecossistema Microsoft, incluindo versionamento, promoção entre ambientes, monitoramento e operação de modelos em produção.
* Atuação prévia com DevSecOps/DataSecOps aplicados a dados e modelos, com foco em automação, versionamento e integração contínua.
* Experiência na definição e implantação de governança de dados corporativa baseada em frameworks de mercado (ex.: DAMA\-DMBOK), cobrindo políticas, padrões, papéis, processos e métricas.
* Conhecimento avançado em gestão de metadados, linhagem, glossário/dicionário de dados, qualidade de dados e modelo operacional de governança no contexto corporativo.

 **O que será um diferencial:**

* Experiência prática em Azure Databricks aplicada a projetos de Data Science já implantados em produção no ambiente Microsoft.
* Certificações Microsoft na trilha de dados e/ou analytics.

  

**Informações adicionais** **NOSSOS BENEFÍCIOS:**

**Sendo uma empresa voltada para pessoas, buscamos sempre valorizar a nossa equipe. Ao entrar para o Time Vetta, oferecemos:**

* **Cartão Flash** com **vale\-alimentação/refeição** de **R$ 32,00 por dia**, aceito em diversos estabelecimentos para você usar como preferir.
* **Auxílio home office** de **R$ 100,00/mês** e **flexibilidade no horário** de trabalho.
* Se você trabalhar no escritório da Vetta, em Belo Horizonte, terá **Vale\-Transporte**.
* Pensando na sua saúde e bem\-estar, oferecemos **Plano de Saúde SulAmérica** e **Plano Odontológico Bradesco**,com a possibilidade de inclusão dos seus dependentes.
* **WellHub, TotalPass** e **UniCamente**, para você cuidar da sua saúde integralmente, com acesso a atividades físicas e a profissionais de diversas áreas da saúde.
* **Clube de Descontos e Recompensas**, com descontos em diversas redes de produtos e de serviços.
* **Licença maternidade e paternidade estendida,** para os pais e mães viverem essa fase com tranquilidade.
* **PLR \-** conforme tabela do sindicato.

 **E TEM MAIS...**

* **Day\-Off de Aniversário.**
* **No Dress Code.** Vista\-se com o que te deixa confortável!
* **Programa de Incentivo à Formação Contínua e Capacitação**, para que você possa continuar aprendendo e compartilhando experiências.
* Quer indicar alguém para a Vetta? Temos **Programa de Indicação de Talentos.**

 **Se interessou em fazer parte do time? Cadastre\-se agora! Ficaremos felizes em ter você conosco.**

  

  

**Somos uma empresa global de digitalização industrial**, com duas décadas de experiência no segmento, que contribui com a eficiência operacional e com a **redução do consumo de energia e de gases através da descarbonização**. Acreditamos que, com **inovação e ação**, podemos tornar o mundo mais sustentável e os processos industriais mais eficientes.

  

Atuamos em conjunto com a SMS group, líder mundial no segmento de metais, e somos responsáveis pelo desenvolvimento de soluções digitais para nossos clientes em mais de 14 países pelo mundo. As nossas soluções contam com a combinação de experiência em processos, know\-how de inteligência artificial (IA) e recursos de desenvolvimento de software para resultar em tecnologias de ponta e de otimização.

  

Queremos trazer soluções inovadoras, buscando melhores formas de tornar a indústria e o futuro mais sustentável por meio da descarbonização. **Quer fazer parte dessa história?** **\#VemSerVetta**

 *Todas as nossas vagas são inclusivas e abertas a todos e todas sem distinção por deficiência (PCD), raça, cor, religião, gênero, nacionalidade ou qualquer outra forma de diversidade.*

title: Diagnostics Requirements Definition Specialist
description:
**Sobre a empresa:** 
 A IAV é uma das companhias líderes mundiais na prestação de serviços em engenharia automotiva. Independente de onde você se encontre, certamente encontrará veículos que incluem desenvolvimentos da IAV. Somos entusiastas veiculares, e observamos o mundo pelos olhos dos motoristas \- nosso nome indica conhecimento técnico, soluções duradouras e satisfação na condução inteligente. A combinação de excelentes desenvolvedores e equipamentos de altíssima qualidade garantem que seu projeto termine com excelência!
   

  

 “What we develop moves you” – Essa é nossa promessa pra você!
   

  

 Para mais informações sobre a empresa: https://www.iav.com/BR\_pt
   

  

**Sobre a oportunidade:** 
 Como parte da divisão de Dinâmica Veicular, o especialista de Definição de Requisitos de Diagnóstico se reporta ao Gerente Global de Diagnósticos. Esta posição é responsável por gerenciar e definir requisitos de diagnóstico e coordenar informações com desenvolvedores de software, operações de fábrica e serviço.
   

  

**Responsabilidades e atribuições**
* Requisitos de design para diagnóstico de acordo com os requisitos padrão.
* Descrever os requisitos de diagnóstico em documentos específicos definidos.
* Revisar documentos de fornecedores e compartilhá\-los com aqueles que implementam o software.
* Fornecer suporte nas várias etapas de testes de V\&V.
* Gerenciamento de problemas (Sistema de Rastreamento de Problemas do Powertrain).
* Apoiar a empresa e o serviço nas várias fases pré e pós Job1\.


**Requisitos e qualificações**
**Qualificações necessárias**
* Bacharelado/Mestrado em Ciências em Engenharia Mecânica/Automotiva ou Engenharia de Automação.
* Formação técnica em dinâmica veicular e sistemas de controle.
* Capacidade de interpretar e discutir algoritmos de controle complexos.
* Conhecimento de Matlab, Simulink, Stateflow.
* Conhecimento de design baseado em modelos.
* Conhecimento de padrões de comunicação automotiva (CAN, UDS, J1939\).
* Conhecimento de ferramentas Vector como CANalyzer, CANape.
* Conhecimento de ferramentas ETAS como INCA/MDA.
* Conhecimento de desenvolvimento de software embarcado (C, C\+\+).
* Inglês avançado


**Qualificações diferenciais**
* Experiência com desenvolvimento do produto no ramo automotivo e/ou conhecimento em módulos eletrônicos e eletrônica automotiva
* Experiência com teste de sistemas ADAS / ECUs
* Conhecimentos de programação em Python, Vector CAPL
* Certificação ISTQB Certified Tester Foundation Level / Test Analyst
* Alemão básico ou intermediário


**Informações adicionais**
* Contrato CLT
* Horário Flexível
* Vale Refeição ou Alimentação
* Combustível ou Vale Transporte
* PLR
* Incentivo para cursos: Idiomas e especializações
* Seguro de Vida e Saúde e Odontológico
* Parcerias com Universidades e Escolas de Idiomas

title: Audio Transcription Specialist
description:
Innodata (NASDAQ: INOD) is a leading data engineering company.
   

  

 With more than 2,000 customers and operations in 13 cities around the world, we are an AI technology solutions provider\-of\-choice for 4 out of 5 of the world's biggest technology companies, as well as leading companies across financial services, insurance, technology, law, and medicine.
   

  

 By combining advanced machine learning and artificial intelligence (ML/AI) technologies, a global workforce of subject matter experts, and a high\-security infrastructure, we're helping usher in the promise of AI.
   

  

 Innodata offers a powerful combination of both digital data solutions and easy\-to\-use, high\-quality platforms.Our global workforce includes over 5,000 employees in the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, the Philippines, India, Sri Lanka, Israel and Germany.Job Title: Audio Transcription Specialist(Language: Portuguese, Location: Portugal)About The Role:
   

  

 We are seekingdetail\-oriented and dedicated professionalswith hands\-on experience inaudio transcription and quality assurance .
   

  

 The ideal candidate will be responsible for accurately converting audio content into written text, maintaining high standards of accuracy, consistency, and confidentiality throughout the process.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
 Listen carefully to audio recordings andtranscribe them into clear, accurate, and grammatically correct text .
   

  

 Identify andcorrect transcription errors , ensuring proper spelling, punctuation, and formatting.
   

  

 Handledifferent accents, speech clarity levels, and background noiseswith attention to detail.
   

  

 Tag and label transcriptionsas per project guidelines.
   

  

 Review, proofread, and edit transcripts forquality, accuracy, and completeness .
   

  

 Follow client\-specific formatting and delivery instructions.
   

  

 Work closely with project leads and QA teams tomeet daily quality and productivity targets .
   

  

 Maintainconfidentiality and data securityof all content handled.
   

  

**Requirements**
 Proven experience inaudio transcriptionor related linguistic work.
   

  

 Excellent command ofEnglish (or other project\-specific language)with strong grammar and listening skills.
   

  

 Good typing speed and accuracywith familiarity in transcription tools or software.
   

  

 Ability to work independently andmeet tight deadlines .
   

  

 High attention to detailand ability to follow formatting guidelines strictly.
   

  

 Must have areliable internet connection, functional laptop/desktop, and good\-quality headphones(mandatory).
   

  

**Preferred Qualifications**
 Prior experience inAI training, transcription QA, or linguistic data projects .
   

  

 Familiarity withtimestamping, labeling, or annotation tasks .
   

  

 Experience working withglobal transcription platformsor large\-scale linguistic projects.
   

  

 Knowledge ofspeech\-to\-text softwareandaudio editing toolsis an added advantage.If Interested, kindly send your resume at:\*\*\*\*\*\*.

title: Pessoa Desenvolvedora Back End III - Golang
Assistente de Suporte de Sistemas
description:
Descrição:
Para estes desafios você precisa ter:

  

* Superior Cursando a partir do 2º semestre de cursos relacionados à Tecnologia da Informação, Análise e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas, ou áreas correlatas.
* Noções básicas de bancos de dados (SQL). Conhecimento em sistemas operacionais (ex: Windows/Linux). Noções de redes e conceitos básicos de ERP. Pacote Office e ferramentas de chamados (ex: GLPI, Jira, ServiceNow).
* Necessário vivência com suporte e atividades mencionadas acima


Como Assistente de Suporte de Sistemas, você estará a frente dos seguintes desafios:

  

Auxiliar na manutenção, atendimento e suporte técnico aos usuários dos sistemas corporativos, contribuindo para o bom funcionamento das ferramentas de tecnologia utilizadas pela empresa, além de atuar no registro e acompanhamento de chamados, apoio em testes de sistemas, identificação de erros e na comunicação com as áreas internas e fornecedores de tecnologia.

  

PRINCIPAIS ATIVIDADES:  



  

* Atender solicitações e incidentes relacionados aos sistemas, registrando detalhadamente cada ocorrência nas ferramentas de controle, acompanhando o andamento e garantindo retorno adequado aos usuários.
* Apoiar na análise de erros e comportamentos inesperados dos sistemas, verificando logs, reproduzindo cenários e colaborando com a equipe técnica na definição de soluções ou encaminhamento para níveis superiores de suporte.
* Contribuir para a estabilidade dos sistemas realizando verificações rotineiras, auxiliando em atualizações e ajustes técnicos sob orientação da equipe responsável, visando minimizar indisponibilidades.
* Participar dos processos de validação de alterações em sistemas, executando testes de funcionalidades, registrando evidências e reportando inconsistências ou oportunidades de melhoria antes da liberação final.
* Elaborar e atualizar manuais, tutoriais e registros técnicos que descrevam rotinas de suporte, soluções aplicadas e boas práticas, garantindo a padronização e o compartilhamento do conhecimento.
* Identificar oportunidades de aprimoramento nas rotinas de suporte e no uso dos sistemas, propondo soluções que aumentem a eficiência, reduzam falhas e aprimorem a experiência dos usuários.

title: Medical Technical Support
description:
**Role Overview**



This role is primarily focused on Biomedical \& Radiation Testing, providing technical support for biomed engineers \& medical physicists. This includes testing medical devices \& X\-ray devices in\-house. The Medical Support Engineer will troubleshoot, test, evaluate and support the users of medical device testers while supporting R\&D, Product Management, and customer training initiatives. The medical engineer should provide expert assistance on hardware, software ensuring optimal performance and user satisfaction.

  


**Primary Responsibilities**


* Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve hardware and software issues related to radiation \& medical device testers in Fluke labs.
* Execute hands\-on testing, debugging, and evaluation of medical device testers together with infusion pumps, ventilators, defibrillators, electrical surgery units, etc..
* Execute hands\-on testing, debugging, and evaluation of radiation device testers together with traditional X\-ray machines, mammography, C\-arms and other radiation sources.
* Maintain lab equipment, perform regular calibrations, and ensure compliance with safety and regulatory standards.
* Provide medical \& biomedical/technical Support via tickets, emails, and phone.
* Support service \& calibration, production teams, customer service, and quality engineers with complicated cases.
* Collaborate with R\&D teams during early\-stage development for HW/SW testing.
* Provide feedback to Product Management on device performance and usability.
* Document testing, debugging, and testing results accurately (DMVM sheets, procedural documents, reports).
* Support with training to channel partners and customers on device usage and best practices.
* Handle customer complaints related to device performance, collaborating with quality teams.
* Support hospital\-based testing scenarios and field evaluations as required.

  


**Basic Requirements**


* University degree within Medical physics or Biomedical engineering.
* A few years of Biomedical testing experience in a hospital, or medical physics experience.
* Proficiency with medical devices, X\-ray labs, and general hospital devices
* Proficiency in reading, interpreting, and applying service manuals and technical documentation for medical devices
* Proficiency with computers, operating systems, software, and hardware troubleshooting
* Basic knowledge in ISO standards and compliance (ANSI/AAMI ES\-1, IEC62353, IEC60601\-1, AS/NZS 3551, IEC 60846\-1, IEC 61326\-1, ISO 4037\-1:2019\)
* Experience within product testing, calibration, or metrology within healthcare and radiation testing
* Ability to read and interpret technical manuals, schematics, and technical documents
* Familiarity with CRM or ticketing systems
* Strong problem solving, analytical, oral, and written communication skills
* Must be fluent in English
* Good knowledge in Microsoft Office
* Ability to work independently while collaborating with peers and other professionals
* A good and flexible team player

**Fortive Corporation Overview**


Fortive’s essential technology makes the world safer and more productive. We accelerate transformation in high\-impact fields like workplace safety, build environments, and healthcare.


We are a global industrial technology innovator with a startup spirit. Our forward\-looking companies lead the way in healthcare sterilization, industrial safety, predictive maintenance, and other mission\-critical solutions. We’re a force for progress, working alongside our customers and partners to solve challenges on a global scale, from workplace safety in the most demanding conditions to advanced technologies that help providers focus on exceptional patient care.


We are a diverse team 10,000 strong, united by a dynamic, inclusive culture and energized by limitless learning and growth. We use the proven Fortive Business System (FBS) to accelerate our positive impact.


At Fortive, we believe in you. We believe in your potential—your ability to learn, grow, and make a difference.


At Fortive, we believe in us. We believe in the power of people working together to solve problems no one could solve alone.


At Fortive, we believe in growth. We’re honest about what’s working and what isn’t, and we never stop improving and innovating.


Fortive: For you, for us, for growth.

**About Fluke Health Solutions**


Comprised of four industry leaders—Fluke Biomedical, LANDAUER, RaySafe, and Victoreen — Fluke Health Solutions (FHS) leads the biomedical and radiation detection markets with innovative products and services that help keep customers, patients, and clients safe. Fluke Biomedical leads the world in manufacturing biomedical test equipment like defibrillator analyzers and digital pressure meters. LANDAUER measures radiation exposure with dosimeter and radiation monitoring badges. RaySafe is the worldwide leader of X\-ray test equipment, real\-time staff dosimetry, and radiation survey meters. And Victoreen instruments are the trusted source for radiation monitoring systems and quality assurance for nuclear power professionals. At FHS, we believe in your potential — your ability to learn, grow and contribute in meaningful ways. And we believe in giving you the opportunity, accountability, and visibility to do just that.


We Are an Equal Opportunity Employer. Fortive Corporation and all Fortive Companies are proud to be equal opportunity employers. We value and encourage diversity and solicit applications from all qualified applicants without regard to race, color, national origin, religion, sex, age, marital status, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or other characteristics protected by law. Fortive and all Fortive Companies are also committed to providing reasonable accommodations for applicants with disabilities. Individuals who need a reasonable accommodation because of a disability for any part of the employment application process, please contact us at applyassistance@fortive.com.

title: Supply Chain Specialist, AWS Infrastructure Services
description:
**DESCRIPTION**
---------------


AWS Infrastructure Services owns the design, planning, delivery, and operation of all AWS global infrastructure. In other words, we’re the people who keep the cloud running. We support all AWS data centers and all of the servers, storage, networking, power, and cooling equipment that ensure our customers have continual access to the innovation they rely on. We work on the most challenging problems, with thousands of variables impacting the supply chain — and we’re looking for talented people who want to help.
  

  

You’ll join a diverse team of software, hardware, and network engineers, supply chain specialists, security experts, operations managers, and other vital roles. You’ll collaborate with people across AWS to help us deliver the highest standards for safety and security while providing seemingly infinite capacity at the lowest possible cost for our customers. And you’ll experience an inclusive culture that welcomes bold ideas and empowers you to own them to completion.  

  

As a Supply Chain Specialist, you will be responsible for the creation and processing of Purchase Requisitions aligned to pre\-defined SLAs, support IPS\-Procurement implementing sourcing strategies and collaborate with internal business partners and suppliers to reduce risks and costs for Amazon. You will manage metrics to hold suppliers accountable for performance and delivery. Additionally, you will drive results through the management of competitive bidding processes and analyze data and market trends in support of the category managers. You will also support the continuous improvement of global Procurement processes and tools.
  

  

The ideal candidate thinks long term, drives initiatives, and communicates appropriately and influences customers and suppliers at all levels. Operating in a fast\-moving and sometimes ambiguous environment you will be required to work autonomously taking full control and responsibility for achieving business objectives. Tools and resources change frequently so adaptability is critical. You will continuously look for better ways to manage your work. You should be flexible and adaptable to get into different operational roles within Infrastructure operations. To be successful in this role you have a sense of urgency to meet customer timelines; the ability to prioritize workload; exhibit an intense curiosity and learning drive; succeed in a fast\-paced environment; engage and influence key stakeholders; and have a high level of customer focus and business judgement. Also, you must have a demonstrated track record of working multiple projects and supporting their completion to meet business objectives. It will be critical to embrace and model Amazon’s Leadership Principles and have an entrepreneurial spirit with a “get it done” mentality.  

  

  

  

  

  

Key job responsibilities  

* Achieve cost savings through bidding and negotiations
* Plan and execute effective negotiation strategies with vendors.
* Analyze category data and metrics to drive Procurement category strategies
* Engage internal stakeholders to ensure minimum requirements to create a PR are met.
* Manage the new supplier qualification and onboarding process.
* Manage RFx events and documentation.
* Support suppliers with issue resolution across the P2P process.
* Analyze supplier performance data and metrics to assist the development of Procurement category strategies.
* Ensure you are knowledgeable about the supply market and supplier capabilities, technically and geographically.
* Develop mechanisms and metrics to track supplier performance related to delivery, quality, and cost.
* Participate in business reviews to discuss best practices and issues and to ultimately improve supplier performance and strengthen business partnerships.
* Innovate within the procurement space, improving tools or processes to better support the Procurement Lifecycle.
* Provide support throughout the contracting process, as well as management of contracts post\-execution.

  

About the team  

\*Why AWS\*  

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.  

  

\*Diverse Experiences\*  

Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.  

  

\*Work/Life Balance\*  

We value work\-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.  

  

\*Inclusive Team Culture\*  

Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee\-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.  

  

\*Mentorship and Career Growth\*  

We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge\-sharing, mentorship and other career\-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better\-rounded professional.**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------

* Speak, write, and read fluently in English
* 4\+ years of work in a procurement organization, performing vendor management, contract management, negotiating complex purchases, and bidding experience
* 4\+ years of developing program strategies and plans, diving execution, and influencing senior stakeholders experience

**PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS**
----------------------------

* Experience using data and analytics to drive sales strategy and results
* Experience in data centers, infrastructure service providers, or related technology companies
* Experience in procurement
* Ability to communicate and report on market intelligence data, including trends and labor indexes.

  

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how\-we\-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
