title: Analista Midia de Performance Sênior - Remoto
description:
**Na RankMyAds, somos apaixonados por mídia e por transformar dados em decisões que geram resultados. Nosso time multidisciplinar reúne estrategistas de mídia, analistas de dados, publishers \& afiliados e accounts, que atuam de forma colaborativa para garantir performance, insights e a melhor experiência comercial aos nossos parceiros.**


**Critérios obrigatórios:**  

* Experiência sólida em campanhas de mídia paga focadas em performance e aquisição, não apenas awareness.
* Domínio de ao menos três plataformas, entre: Google Ads, Apple Ads, DV360, Meta Ads, Adnetworks, entre outras.
* Capacidade analítica para tomada de decisões baseada em dados e KPIs.
* Organização para gerenciar cronogramas, entregas e múltiplas frentes simultaneamente.
* Comunicação clara, espírito colaborativo e proatividade para sugerir e implementar ações.

**Será um diferencial:**  

* Vivência em agências ou clientes com foco mobile.
* Familiaridade com modelos de atribuição e mensuração de LTV.
* Experiência com campanhas de retargeting e DPA dinâmico.
* Conhecimento em testes incrementais ou modelos de lift.
* Atuação com eventos in\-app e leitura de dados em plataformas como Firebase, GA4 ou MMPs (AppsFlyer, Adjust etc.).

**Responsabilidades do dia a dia:**


* Planejar e executar campanhas com foco em performance mobile / web, do briefing ao acompanhamento do ROAS.
* Rodar campanhas em diferentes canais (Apple Ads, GAds, Meta, DV360, Adnetworks, etc), ajustando estratégia, budget e segmentação de acordo com a etapa do funil.


* Construir cronogramas e organizar milestones por cliente, garantindo cadência nas


entregas e visibilidade dos resultados.  

* Realizar otimizações semanais com base em dados (eventos in\-app, CPA, CTR, LTV, ROAS), ajustando bids, criativos, audiências, estratégias de lances e modelos de atribuição.
* Fazer testes A/B recorrentes: criativo vs. criativo, fonte vs. fonte, campanha vs. campanha.
* Criar e manter históricos e timelines que ajudem a extrair insights e facilitar a leitura para os times e os clientes.
* Monitorar KPIs de performance e sinais de fraude (cliques inválidos, fontes com


baixa qualidade, bot traffic etc.).  

* Participar dos rituais internos com times de accounts, BI, planejamento, contribuindo com visão estratégica de mídia.
* Levantar oportunidades de novos canais, formatos e modelos de compra — e pilotar testes com autonomia.
* Apoiar e trocar com analistas de outras squads e perfis mais juniores, contribuindo com boas práticas, insights e revisões
* Analisar dados de performance em ferramentas internas, identificar padrões, levantar insights e propor ações para o resultado.
* Produzir relatórios / MBRs estratégicos para clientes, abordando performance, movimentações táticas realizadas e próximos passos sugeridos.

title: Coordenação de Inteligência de Dados
Agente de Serviços (Telefonia)
Product owner especialista | growth marketing b2b
ANALISTA DE DESENVOLVIMENTO NODEJS E REACT - SENIOR
description:
A Funcional Health Tech é movida pela certeza de que a Saúde é o pilar principal da vida das pessoas, por isso quebramos barreiras para promovê\-la de forma sustentável.

  

Para realizar nosso propósito, inovamos todos os dias unindo pessoas, tecnologia e dados para prover o ecossistema da saúde com soluções que geram eficiência e sustentabilidade em toda a cadeia.

  

Aqui, você irá participar, de maneira direta ou indireta, da criação de novas soluções para os mais diversos serviços de saúde porque essa é a missão diária de todos nós na Funcional. Pesquisamos, criamos e fazemos acontecer, porque está em nosso DNA.

 **Responsabilidades e atribuições** **Sua missão como Analista de Desenvolvimento NodeJs e React Será:**

* Desenvolver e manter aplicações web incríveis usando Node.js, React e .NET.
* Participar de reuniões de planejamento e ajudar a refinar os requisitos técnicos – sua voz importa!
* Colaborar de pertinho com as equipes de design, QA e produto para garantir entregas de alta qualidade.
* Apoiar na correção de bugs e nas melhorias contínuas do sistema, buscando sempre a excelência.
* Versionar código usando Git e seguir as melhores práticas.

  

**Requisitos e qualificações** **Habilidades que esperamos que você possua:**

* Formação completo em Analise e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas, Sistemas da Informação, Engenharia de Software e afins.
* Conhecimento em Node.js e React.
* Familiaridade com .NET (C\#) e ASP.NET Core.
* Entendimento de Banco de Dados (especialmente SQL Server).
* Capacidade para consumir e criar APIs.
* Experiência (mesmo que em projetos acadêmicos ou pessoais) com as tecnologias que mencionamos.
* Conhecimento sobre metodologias ágeis como Scrum ou Kanban.

 **Informações adicionais** **Como é trabalhar aqui na Funcional Health Tech:**

* Nosso time é incrível, colaboramos e fazemos juntos para ir mais longe.
* Nossa cultura é ágil e estamos em constante evolução.
* Incentivamos o crescimento profissional e o desenvolvimento dos nossos colaboradores com diversas ações e encontros, através de plataforma de treinamentos e webinars mensais, além da “Baratona”, que é o nosso Hackathon interno.

  

"A Funcional reconhece que a diversidade traz benefícios para o negócio e que um ambiente plural e colaborativo é propício para a inovação acontecer. Desta forma nossas oportunidades abraçam todos os talentos, sem distinção de cor, raça, gênero ou qualquer condição de deficiência. Todos os talentos podem participar igualitariamente nos processos seletivos da Funcional. Venha fazer parte do nosso time!"

 **Sobre a Funcional Health Tech**


Há mais de 25 anos, acreditamos que cuidar da saúde é cuidar da vida em sua forma mais plena, conectando empresas, farmácias, indústrias e pessoas, para ampliar o acesso a medicamentos e promover cuidado inteligente e sustentável.


Nosso time é colaborativo, diverso e apaixonado por gerar impacto real. Inquietude com impacto. Inovar é a nossa natureza e fazemos isso com inteligência de dados e foco em valor, porque a vida das pessoas é o nosso propósito.


Usamos tecnologia de ponta, análise de dados e um time multidisciplinar para criar soluções que melhoram a jornada de saúde de milhões de brasileiros. Nosso novo posicionamento reforça quem sempre fomos: protagonistas na transformação da saúde, unindo inteligência, empatia e propósito.


Aqui, você vai contribuir diretamente para criar e aprimorar soluções que facilitam o acesso, melhoram a adesão a tratamentos e geram resultados concretos para pacientes e parceiros. Pesquisamos, criamos e colocamos em prática, porque cuidar está no nosso DNA.

 **O que você vai encontrar aqui**


O cuidado com as pessoas é a essência do nosso negócio. Nossos benefícios foram pensados para apoiar sua saúde, bem\-estar, desenvolvimento e equilíbrio de vida:

 **Para sua saúde:**

* Plano de saúde e odontológico
* Benefício Farmácia: a Funcional subsidia parte dos seus medicamentos
* Seguro de vida
* Vacina contra a gripe
* Programa de gestão da saúde integrada do colaborador e seus dependentes
* TotalPass: acesso a academias e serviços de bem\-estar

 **Para sua família:**

* Auxílio\-creche
* Licença\-maternidade e paternidade estendidas

 **Para seu bem\-estar e desenvolvimento:**

* Auxílio home office (para vagas remotas)
* Vale\-transporte (para vagas presenciais)
* Vale\-refeição/alimentação
* Programa de Participação nos Resultados anual (para cargos elegíveis)
* Day off de aniversário
* Ações de desenvolvimento contínuo
* Parcerias com instituições de ensino

  

**Aqui, seu talento encontra propósito.**

 **NOSSA CULTURA**

 **CONECTADO COM O CLIENTE!**


Escutamos ativamente, entendemos as necessidades e criamos soluções que encantam e geram impacto real. Nossa centralidade no cliente é humana, empática e guiada por dados.


\#EMPATIAQUETRANSFORMA

 **ÉTICA INABALÁVEL!**


Fazemos o que é certo, sempre, mesmo quando é mais difícil. A ética está no centro de cada decisão, relação e entrega. Para nós, integridade é base, não opção.


\#SEMJEITINHO

 **EXCELÊNCIA ENTREGA VALOR!**


Fazemos com qualidade, eficiência e agilidade. Excelência é o nosso compromisso diário com a vida.


\#EXCELÊNCIAÉRESPEITO

 **COLABORAÇÃO SEM FRONTEIRAS!**


Somos mais fortes juntos. Supramos desafios, somamos saberes e conectamos pessoas, áreas e parceiros para criar soluções completas e integradas.


\#JUNTOSPOR\+SAÚDE

 **INQUIETUDE COM PROPÓSITO!**


Inovar é a nossa natureza e fazemos isso com inteligência de dados e foco em valor. Questionamos o agora para construir um amanhã mais saudável e acessível.


\#INOVAÇÃOCOMSENTIDO

 **AQUI O PAPO É RETO!**


Falar com verdade e ouvir com atenção é como criamos confiança. Valorizamos diálogos diretos, respeitosos e construtivos. Assim são relações saudáveis.


\#PAPORETO

title: Consultor(a) Mainframe Sênior
Senior Backend Engineer
description:
SumUp empowers businesses to get paid effortlessly, process orders fast, sell online in minutes, and manage their money with confidence. We build the tools that help businesses — and their customer experiences — thrive.



As a key member of the Payments BR Tribe, you'll help shape and deliver innovative products that make a real difference for our merchants in Brazil. You'll join a global, autonomous, cross\-functional team committed to turning bold ideas into seamless, high\-impact solutions. Being part of the Payments team means working alongside driven, purpose\-led people who take ownership, embrace challenges, and are passionate about helping businesses succeed.



As a Senior Backend Engineer within the Reconciliation Squad, you'll lead the design and delivery of robust systems that ensure accuracy, transparency, and trust in our financial operations.


**What you'll do**


* Guide engineering decisions and mentor other developers.
* Design, implement, and maintain **highly available backend services** that process and reconcile transaction data at scale.
* Redesign and evolve architectural systems to support the transition toward a **standalone reconciliation and reporting application** for payment receivables.
* Collaborate with multiple squads and stakeholders to address urgent requests while protecting the squad's long\-term technical vision.
* Optimize database performance, improve test coverage, and ensure observability, resilience, and reliability across systems.
* Actively participate in architectural discussions within the Payments BR tribe.


**You'll be great for this role if you:**


* Have **strong software engineering expertise**, including code design, quality attributes, automated testing, CI/CD, performance optimization, resilience patterns, and distributed systems.
* Are proficient in at least one of the following languages: **Golang or Python** (experience with multiple is a plus).
* Have deep experience with **relational databases** (especially PostgreSQL) and are comfortable with schema modeling, query optimization, and database tuning.
* Worked with **messaging queues** (SQS, RabbitMQ) and **stream processing** platforms (Kafka).
* Are comfortable working with **MongoDB and Redis.**
* Are capable of producing clear, structured **technical documentation**.
* Thrive in **ambiguous environments**, are adaptable, and can balance long\-term technical improvements with short\-term high\-priority demands.
* Have **advanced English proficiency** and can present and discuss technical topics effectively in public forums or cross\-team settings.

  


**Why you should join SumUp**


**Global Experience**: Collaborate with a diverse team of 3,000\+ people from over 90 countries, and join our global off\-sites and hackathons.



**Collaborative Culture:** Join a team that values diversity, innovation, and teamwork, where your ideas and contributions truly matter.


**Career Growth**: Be part of a global team working on large\-scale fintech products used by millions of businesses.


**Great Benefits**: Health plans, meal vouchers (VR), Zenklub, Wellhub, life insurance, childcare allowance, and more.


**Learning \& Development**: Access an annual budget of **R$ 10,000** for education, certifications, and conferences.


**Time Off**: Enjoy **30 additional days off** through our **Break4Me** program after 3 years at SumUp.


**Grow with Us:** Participate in our virtual stock program and benefit from SumUp's success with company shares.

  


**Learn more about SumUp**  

**Office tour at São Paulo**  

**Ask me anything: Engineering at SumUp**  

**SumUp's Innovation Hackathon**
  

**Get to know our hiring process**  

  

**Ready to Join us?**  

Apply now and help us shape the future of financial solutions for small businesses!

 **Job Application Tip**



We recognise that candidates feel they need to meet 100% of the job criteria in order to apply for a job. Please note that this is only a guide. If you don't tick every box, it's ok too because it means you have room to learn and develop your career at SumUp.

title: Listing Specialist (Amazon)
description:
**Role:** Listing Specialist (Amazon)
  
**Hours:** 8am \- 4pm Pacific Standard Time
  
**USD Salary:** $6 \- $10 per hour \| $960 \- $1,600 per month (Open to negotiation based on experience)
  
  

Lago is looking for a talented Listing Specialist to join our team and ensure quality, accuracy, and optimization across product catalogs on the Amazon platform.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

* Through the use of company and department practices and procedures, ensure optimized product listings with accurate descriptions and images for assigned clients
* Upload and maintain all product details on the Amazon platform, including descriptions, images, and specifications
* Ensure all product listings are complete, accurate, and compliant
* Proactively identify issues within the catalog, such as missing information or incorrect attributes
* Collaborate cross\-functionally to resolve listing issues promptly
* Identify and propose strategies to minimize listing errors and maintain high listing quality
* Generate regular reports on listing status, issues, and performance metrics
* Provide insights and recommendations for catalog improvements and growth strategies
* Stay updated with Amazon’s policies and guidelines to ensure compliance
* Maintain or exceed department\-established performance standards
* Continue to learn and apply department Trainual subjects according to standards

* Demonstrated working knowledge of managing, updating, and optimizing Amazon listings

title: QA (Quality Assurance)
location: São José dos Campos, SP, BR
description:
**Descrição**



Buscamos um(a) QA Junior para garantir a excelência na qualidade das nossas aplicações. Você será responsável por planejar, executar e automatizar testes funcionais, regressivos, de desempenho e segurança. Terá a oportunidade de atuar diretamente com ferramentas modernas como **Cypress** e **Playwright**, garantindo a robustez das soluções entregues.  

Você colaborará ativamente com as equipes de desenvolvimento, produto e DevOps, participando da definição e refinamento de User Stories, análise criteriosa de requisitos e validação contínua. Além disso, utilizará o **Azure Boards** para acompanhar e gerenciar as atividades de testes, documentando e reportando falhas identificadas e contribuindo ativamente para a melhoria contínua dos processos.  

Se você é apaixonado por tecnologia, gosta de desafios e deseja trabalhar em um ambiente ágil e inovador, essa é a sua oportunidade!


**Responsabilidades e atribuições**



Execução de Testes de Software: Realizar testes de software de acordo com planos e casos de teste pré\-definidos, garantindo que todas as funcionalidades sejam minuciosamente avaliadas e estejam em conformidade com os requisitos especificados.



Planejamento e Execução de Testes:  

Planejar e executar testes funcionais, de regressão, de desempenho, de segurança, e outros tipos de testes conforme necessário.  

Colaborar com as equipes de desenvolvimento e produto para definir estratégias de testes que assegurem a cobertura adequada de todas as funcionalidades e cenários de uso.



Automação de Testes:  

Criar, manter e evoluir planos de teste e scripts de automação utilizando ferramentas como Cypress e Playwriter.  

Garantir que os testes automatizados sejam integrados no ciclo de desenvolvimento contínuo, proporcionando feedback rápido e eficiente às equipes de desenvolvimento.  

Análise de Requisitos: Revisar e analisar requisitos e especificações do sistema para garantir que todos os aspectos críticos do software sejam cobertos pelos testes. Identificar áreas de melhoria e propor soluções para otimizar a qualidade do produto.



Manutenção e Melhoria Contínua:  

Documentar defeitos encontrados durante os testes e trabalhar em colaboração com as equipes de desenvolvimento para garantir a resolução eficiente dos problemas.  

Participar de reuniões de revisão de código e de produto, trazendo uma perspectiva orientada à qualidade.



Colaboração e Comunicação:  

Trabalhar em estreita colaboração com as equipes de desenvolvimento, produto, e DevOps para garantir que as melhores práticas de QA sejam incorporadas em todas as etapas do desenvolvimento de software.  

Utilizar Azure Boards para gerenciar e acompanhar o progresso das User Stories e Tasks, garantindo que cada atividade relacionada a testes esteja alinhada com os objetivos do projeto e seja concluída dentro dos prazos estabelecidos.  

Colaborar na definição e refinamento das User Stories, assegurando que os critérios de aceitação sejam claros, testáveis e completamente validados.


**Requisitos e qualificações**


**Lógica de Programação:**  

Capacidade de entender e aplicar conceitos lógicos para criação de casos de teste, automação e resolução de problemas técnicos. **SQL (PostgreSQL):**  

Conhecimentos intermediários em SQL para consultas, validações e testes de integridade de dados. **Automação de Testes:**  

Experiência comprovada em automação de testes utilizando **Cypress** e **Playwright**. **Azure Test Plans e Azure Boards:**  

Familiaridade no planejamento, gerenciamento e execução de planos e casos de teste, além de gestão ágil de tarefas e User Stories. **Testes de APIs:**  

Experiência com testes funcionais de APIs REST utilizando ferramentas como Postman ou similares. **Metodologias Ágeis:**  

Conhecimento em metodologias ágeis (Scrum/Kanban), participando ativamente em cerimônias ágeis.
**Desejável / Diferenciais:**


Certificação ISTQB em testes de software. Experiência prévia em empresas do setor financeiro ou plataformas de pagamento. Conhecimento básico em práticas DevOps e CI/CD.

title: Software Engineer II with Accounting Experience (LATAM)
description:
This position is posted by Jobgether on behalf of a partner company. We are currently looking for a
 **Software Engineer II with Accounting Experience (LATAM)** 
 in
 **Latin America** 
 .
   

  

 We are seeking a Software Engineer II with a strong foundation in accounting to help design, develop, and maintain software solutions for financial processes. In this role, you will bridge technical and financial expertise, improving reconciliation, reporting, and automation workflows. You will work collaboratively with cross\-functional teams, contributing to backend development, API integration, and database management while ensuring software quality and compliance. This position offers the opportunity to impact critical financial operations, participate in high\-value projects, and grow within a dynamic, fast\-paced fintech environment. The ideal candidate combines analytical precision, technical skill, and strong problem\-solving abilities to deliver high\-quality software solutions that support business objectives.
   

  

**Accountabilities:**
* Develop, maintain, and enhance backend systems, APIs, and software tools to support financial processes and reconciliation workflows
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to design and implement features that improve automation, accuracy, and reporting
* Leverage accounting experience to identify gaps, optimize processes, and ensure compliance with financial standards
* Participate in the full software development lifecycle, including coding, testing, deployment, and documentation
* Evaluate, deploy, and maintain software tools, monitoring performance and implementing improvements
* Provide guidance and support to team members on financial software usage and best practices
* Ensure adherence to project plans, coding standards, and quality metrics across deliverables


**Requirements**
* Prior experience as an accountant or financial analyst, with solid knowledge of financial operations such as reconciliation, reporting, and compliance
* 3\-7 years of professional software engineering experience, with a strong grasp of backend development and relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL)
* Proficiency in at least one programming language (Golang, Python, or Java) and familiarity with API development
* Experience with cloud infrastructure and DevOps tools, including AWS, Kubernetes, and GitLab CI/CD
* Strong understanding of software development methodology, testing (unit, integration, end\-to\-end), and release processes
* Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Computer Science, or a related field
* High standards for quality, strong problem\-solving skills, and ability to collaborate effectively across teams


**Nice to Have:**
* Familiarity with frontend technologies such as React or React Native
* Experience in fintech or financial services software
* Exposure to automated reporting, monitoring tools (Grafana, Prometheus), and financial metrics


**Benefits**
* Competitive monthly salary ($2,800\-$6,000 USD gross) reflecting skills and experience
* Opportunity to leverage accounting expertise in a high\-impact technical role
* Remote work across Latin America with flexible work arrangements
* Exposure to cutting\-edge fintech systems, cloud technologies, and collaborative development environments
* Career growth opportunities within a dynamic, fast\-paced team
* Supportive culture emphasizing collaboration, innovation, and continuous learning


 Jobgether is a Talent Matching Platform that partners with companies worldwide to efficiently connect top talent with the right opportunities through AI\-driven job matching.
   

  

 When you apply, your profile goes through our AI\-powered screening process designed to identify top talent efficiently and fairly:
   

  

* 🔍 Our AI evaluates your CV and LinkedIn profile thoroughly, analyzing your skills, experience, and achievements
* 📊 It compares your profile to the job's core requirements and past success factors to determine your match score
* 🎯 The top 3 candidates with the highest match are automatically shortlisted
* 🧠 If needed, our human team performs an additional review to ensure no strong profile is missed


 The process is transparent, skills\-based, and free of bias — focusing solely on your fit for the role. Once the shortlist is completed, it is shared directly with the company, which will make final decisions and next steps, including interviews or assessments.
   

  

 Thank you for your interest!

title: Senior Analytics Engineer
description:
\#**Mission**
=============



As our Engineer, your mission will be to build the bridge between our robust Data Lake and the business areas. You will be the key player in empowering our teams (Product, CS, Sales, Marketing) with reliable, accessible, and well\-modeled data to answer the company’s most critical questions. You will not only build pipelines and dashboards but also define best practices for data modeling and serve as the main technical point of contact for business analysts, helping Infleet make increasingly smarter decisions.


\#**What you'll do day\-to\-day**
=================================


* Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand critical questions and translate them into scalable data models.
* Design, build, and maintain efficient ELT pipelines (Airflow \+ dbt \+ Python \+ SQL) transforming raw telemetry/video data from S3 into well\-modeled datasets in Athena/Glue.
* Create strategic dashboards in BI tools and enable self\-service analytics for business teams.
* Implement data quality standards, documentation, discoverability (data catalog) and governance.
* Be the technical reference for analytics, mentoring 1 analyst and supporting analysts regarding sources, metrics and modeling decisions.
* Explore opportunities for predictive models and advanced analysis (e.g., driving patterns, maintenance, cost optimization).

  




\#**Hiring model**
==================



Remote with a quarterly local gathering in the city of São Paulo/SP

  


\#**What we need from you**
===========================


\#**Prerequisites**
-------------------


* **Proficiency in SQL and Python:** Ability to write complex and optimized queries for manipulating and analyzing large volumes of data.
* **ETL/ELT Experience:** Hands\-on experience building and maintaining data pipelines using market tools like Airflow and DBT.
* **Data Modeling:** Strong knowledge of data modeling techniques such as Star Schema, Snowflake, and Data Vault.
* **BI Tools:** Experience with data visualization tools such as Metabase, Tableau, Power BI, or Looker.
* **Communication Skills:** Excellent ability to communicate with both technical and non\-technical profiles, acting as a “translator” between business areas.
* **Proactivity and Autonomy:** Hands\-on profile, able to take initiative, build processes from scratch, and manage priorities in a dynamic environment.

\#**Nice to have**
------------------


* **Experience with data transformation tools** such as dbt (Data Build Tool).
* **Familiarity with cloud environments** like AWS and their respective data services Athena, Glue and others.
* Basic understanding of **statistics and Machine Learning concepts.**
* Interest or experience in the **IoT, logistics, telematics,** or B2B SaaS sectors.

title: Technical Leader - Especialista (Flutter)

description:
Descrição:  

  

Buscamos um(a) Gerente de Projetos para atuar na condução de projetos Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SFCC), garantindo execução estruturada, previsibilidade, qualidade e alinhamento entre cliente, equipe técnica e áreas de negócio. A função envolve gestão completa do ciclo de vida dos projetos, relacionamento com stakeholders e governança de entregas.

  


Principais Atividades  

* Planejar, coordenar e monitorar projetos Salesforce Commerce Cloud.
* Criar e manter o Project Plan como ferramenta central de gestão.
* Facilitar cerimônias ágeis e conduzir ritos em modelo híbrido quando necessário.
* Atuar como principal ponto de contato do cliente, assegurando comunicação clara e objetiva.
* Monitorar KPIs, prazos, riscos e escopo, garantindo previsibilidade.
* Coordenar equipe multidisciplinar (arquitetura, desenvolvimento, QA, UX).
* Gerenciar mudanças de escopo e documentações relacionadas.
* Elaborar e apresentar Status Reports, documentações e materiais do projeto.
* Acompanhar e preparar entregas críticas, incluindo go\-live.

  


Requisitos e Qualificações Obrigatórios* Experiência comprovada como Gerente de Projetos em Salesforce Commerce Cloud.
* Atuação em projetos de grande porte, com vivência em concepção, execução, testes e go\-live.
* Conhecimento funcional de e\-commerce: checkout, catálogo, login, jornadas e regras de compra digital.
* Domínio de Project Plan (Microsoft Project)
* Experiência com Jira, Confluence e ferramentas de gestão.
* Atuação com metodologias ágeis, híbridas e waterfall.
* Disponibilidade para atuar de forma híbrida em nosso escritório localizado em São Paulo \- SP

  


Requisitos e Qualificações Diferenciais* Experiência em integrações entre SFCC e Marketing Cloud
* Certificações Salesforce
* Certificações PMP ou PMI\-ACP

  


Nossos Benefícios  

* Caju: R$ 1\.0000,00 \- Cartão flexível, você pode utilizar em diversas categorias, como alimentação, transporte, cultura, saúde e bem\-estar, promovendo maior liberdade na gestão dos seus benefícios;
* Reembolso de Certificações Salesforce;
* Convênio médico e odontológico: Porto Seguro (P420 Q \- Apartamento Completo) \+ extensão Mediservice (BRANCO CR4 APT);
* Wellhub (antigo Gympass): Benefício corporativo voltado ao bem\-estar físico e mental, que oferece acesso a academias, estúdios, aplicativos de saúde e plataformas de meditação, nutrição, terapia e muito mais;
* Psicologia Viva: Acesso à plataforma Viva, com sessões de terapia online para cuidar da sua saúde mental e bem\-estar emocional;
* Auxilio Creche: Oferecemos um benefício de auxílio creche para apoiar colaboradores com filhos pequenos, contribuindo com os custos relacionados ao cuidado infantil. Nosso objetivo é proporcionar maistranquilidade e equilíbrio entre vida profissional e pessoal;
* Seguro de Vida: Cobertura para garantir sua segurança e proteção em caso de imprevistos;
* Day Off de Aniversário: Um dia de folga no mês do seu aniversário para comemorar do jeito que preferir.

title: Senior Software Development Engineer, IES LATECH & GIS
description:
**DESCRIPTION**
---------------


Ever wondered how Amazon.com website works? Do you like working on projects that are highly visible and are tied closely to Amazon’s growth? Are you seeking an environment where you can drive innovation leveraging the scalability and innovation with Amazon's AWS cloud services?
  

  

The Amazon International Technology Team is hiring Software Development Engineers to work in our Software Development Center in Sao Paulo. The Intech team builds International extensions and new features of the Amazon.com web site for individual countries and creates systems to support Amazon operations. We have already worked in Germany, France, UK, India, China, Italy, Brazil and more.
  

  

A Software Development Engineer (SDE) at Amazon works on real world problems on a global scale, owns their systems end to end and influences the direction of our technology that impacts hundreds of millions of customers around the world.
  

  

At Amazon an SDE can expect to design flexible and scalable solutions, and work on some of the most complex challenges in large\-scale computing by utilizing your skills in data structures, algorithms, and object oriented programming. Coming to Amazon gives you the opportunity to work on a small development team in one of our many rapidly growing organizations.
  

  

You will learn all about how to design, implement and test highly scalable solutions using AWS cloud platform and its many products, in challenging agile projects, working with best in class professionals.
  

  

Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and hires qualified individuals regardless of gender, race, sexual orientation, religion, nationality, age or disability.

**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------

* 5\+ years of non\-internship professional software development experience
* 5\+ years of programming with at least one software programming language experience
* 5\+ years of leading design or architecture (design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and existing systems experience
* Experience as a mentor, tech lead or leading an engineering team

**PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS**
----------------------------

* 5\+ years of full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations experience
* Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent

  

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how\-we\-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.

title: [Job-26042] Mid level Developer Nodejs/GraphQL, Brazil
Technical Customer Support
description:
**Why You Should Join Us?**



Join a passionate and collaborative team at the forefront of delivering exceptional technical support for Intelex, a leading platform in Environmental, Health, Safety, and Quality (EHSQ) management. As a Support Analyst, you’ll play a key role in helping our customers succeed by resolving technical issues and ensuring a seamless user experience. If you're a problem\-solver who thrives in a fast\-paced environment and enjoys making a real impact, we’d love to meet you.

**What You’ll Do?**



As a **Support Analyst**, you’ll be the go\-to expert for our customers, helping them get the most out of the Intelex platform. Your responsibilities will include:
* Managing a dynamic queue of customer support inquiries via our ticketing system, email, and phone.
* Diagnosing and resolving technical issues related to the Intelex software.
* Determining whether issues are system\-related or user\-related.
* Troubleshooting and debugging qualified system issues.
* Investigating root causes and documenting findings for our Research \& Development and Quality Assurance teams.
* Ensuring timely resolution of customer issues in line with service level agreements (SLAs).
* Keeping customers informed on the status of their cases.
* Collaborating with cross\-functional teams to deliver high\-quality solutions.
* Continuously learning and applying knowledge of Intelex products and services.
* Identifying opportunities for product or process improvements based on customer feedback.
* Maintaining strong customer satisfaction and managing open/closed ticket volumes effectively.


**What You Bring**



**Must\-Have Skills \& Experience**
* 1–3 years of experience in technical support, web applications, or quality assurance.
* Strong analytical and problem\-solving skills.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non\-technical users.
* Proven ability to prioritize tasks and manage time effectively in a fast\-paced environment.
* Solid understanding of web\-based application architecture.
* Familiarity with object\-oriented design principles.
* Degree or diploma in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience.

**Nice\-to\-Have Skills**
* Experience with ASP.NET, XML, JavaScript, SQL, or T\-SQL.
* Knowledge of Microsoft Office, screen capture, and time\-tracking tools.
* Understanding of Environmental, Health, Safety, or Quality (EHSQ) domains.
* Bilingualism is a plus.
* MCSE certification is an asset.


**What You’ll Get**


* Competitive salary and performance\-based incentives
* Flexible work arrangements (remote/hybrid options)
* Generous paid time off and holidays
* Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
* Professional development and training opportunities
* A collaborative, inclusive, and mission\-driven work environment
* Opportunities to grow your career within a global organization


\#LI\-NL1



\#LI\-Remote

Fortive’s essential technology makes the world safer and more productive. We accelerate transformation in high\-impact fields like workplace safety, build environments, and healthcare.


We are a global industrial technology innovator with a startup spirit. Our forward\-looking companies lead the way in healthcare sterilization, industrial safety, predictive maintenance, and other mission\-critical solutions. We’re a force for progress, working alongside our customers and partners to solve challenges on a global scale, from workplace safety in the most demanding conditions to advanced technologies that help providers focus on exceptional patient care.


We are a diverse team 10,000 strong, united by a dynamic, inclusive culture and energized by limitless learning and growth. We use the proven Fortive Business System (FBS) to accelerate our positive impact.


At Fortive, we believe in you. We believe in your potential—your ability to learn, grow, and make a difference.


At Fortive, we believe in us. We believe in the power of people working together to solve problems no one could solve alone.


At Fortive, we believe in growth. We’re honest about what’s working and what isn’t, and we never stop improving and innovating.


Fortive: For you, for us, for growth.

**About Intelex**


Since 1992, Intelex Technologies, ULC. is a global leader in the development and support of software solutions for Environment, Health, Safety and Quality (EHSQ) programs. Our scalable, web\-based software provides clients with unprecedented flexibility in managing, tracking and reporting on essential corporate information. title: Desenvolvedor(a) mobile react native (presencial)
Técnico de operações i ( serviços de campo) campo grande
Lead Developer - WFN
description:
**ADP is hiring a Lead Developer**

* *Are you empathetic to client needs and inspired by transformation and impacting the lives of millions of people every day?*
* *Are you looking to join a dynamic, inclusive team environment with a culture of collaboration and belonging?*

In this role, you will work within a scrum team to bring the designs and ideas to life for new or improved web applications. This work will support a mix of internal and external clients. You will work with clients, product managers, architects, software engineers, and more to plan, design, develop, test, and implement impactful solutions that support companies with one to millions of employees.


You will start your day on a scrum call to prioritize and track work. Within the team you work on, you will choose user stories to work within a sprint cycle. You will spend most of your day developing and testing your code. Every three weeks, you will be involved in the release activities.


**Hybrid work model, Porto Alegre Office location.**


**To thrive in this development career, you'll need to be an expert in:**

* Strong Java developer with REST API, spring and Spring\-boot development experience;
* Should be able to write clean code passing sonar quality gate passing;
* Experience in writing JUNITs for coverage;
* Experience writing SQL queries and understanding ORM;
* Good understanding of Jenkins pipelines and CI/CD process;
* Nice to have experience working with Terraform as IaaC;
* Advanced English;

As a Lead Developer, you will work closely with your team to lead and guide projects to success. You'll have a hands\-on role designing, developing, debugging, and deploying software solutions where you can leverage your expertise with code complexities. You'll also serve as a mentor to the junior developers. In the senior role, you will balance the assigning of user stories through prioritization and consideration of the technical interests of each developer on the team. As part of our team, you'll find exciting challenges, get opportunities to grow your career, and develop solid friendships as we design what's next for ADP and the industry. Pace should not scare you. We still find time for a healthy dose of fun.


**WHAT YOU'LL DO:**


You'll start each day with a scrum, working in a team to understand responsibilities, identify issues, and communicate coding priorities while choosing user stories to complete. You will also participate in other agile ceremonies, including scheduled sprint demos, where you will present your work to up to 90 stakeholders.


**Build teams that thrive.** As an experienced leader, you want everyone to shine. You'll start each day by checking in with your engineering team to identify priorities and challenges. You'll find a way to make the team's day go smoother. You are constantly looking for ways to share your knowledge, motivate others and keep everyone engaged and productive.


**Build Products.** You will use your technical expertise to review your team's work and help your people excel in an Agile environment. You're proactive and hands\-on. When you see a potential issue, you never leave things hanging and unfinished. When you and your team deliver a finished product, it's as polished as you could make it.


**Variety of work.** There is no typical day. You could be checking in with a team in India one minute, meeting with leadership to review initiatives for the coming quarter later and tomorrow handling a few ad hoc requests from your peers in other departments.


**YOU'LL LOVE WORKING HERE BECAUSE YOU CAN:**


**Have courageous team collaboration.** Courage comes from how associates are willing to have difficult conversations, speak up, be an owner, and challenge one another's ideas to find the best solution.


**Deliver at epic scale.** We deliver real user outcomes using strong judgment and good instincts. We're obsessed with the art of achieving simplicity with a focus on client happiness and productivity.


**Be surrounded by curious learners.** We align ourselves with other smart people in an environment where we grow and elevate one another to the next level. We encourage our associates to listen, stay agile, and learn from mistakes.


**Act like an owner \& doer.** Mission\-driven and committed to leading change, you will be encouraged to take on any challenge and solve complex problems. No tasks are beneath or too great for us. We are hands\-on and willing to master our craft.


**Give back to others.** Always do the right thing for our clients and our community and humbly give back to the community where we live and work. Support our associates in times of need through ADP's Philanthropic Foundation.


**Join a company committed to equality and equity.** Our goal is to impact lasting change through our actions.


What are you waiting for?**Apply today!**


**A little about ADP:** We are a comprehensive global provider of cloud\-based human capital management (HCM) solutions that unite HR, payroll, talent, time, tax and benefits administration and a leader in business outsourcing services, analytics, and compliance expertise. We believe our people make all the difference in cultivating a down\-to\-earth culture that embraces our core values, welcomes ideas, encourages innovation, and values belonging. We've received recognition for our work by many esteemed organizations, learn more at ADP Awards and Recognition.


**Diversity, Equity, Inclusion \& Equal Employment Opportunity at ADP:** ADP is committed to an inclusive, diverse and equitable workplace, and is further committed to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of any protected characteristic including: race, color, genetic information, creed, national origin, religion, sex, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, lawful alien status, ancestry, age, marital status, protected veteran status or disability. Hiring decisions are based upon ADP’s operating needs, and applicant merit including, but not limited to, qualifications, experience, ability, availability, cooperation, and job performance.


**Ethics at ADP:** ADP has a long, proud history of conducting business with the highest ethical standards and full compliance with all applicable laws. We also expect our people to uphold our values with the highest level of integrity and behave in a manner that fosters an honest and respectful workplace. Click https://jobs.adp.com/life\-at\-adp/ to learn more about ADP’s culture and our full set of values.

title: Software Tester (QA) / Research + Development - Trabalho Remoto | REF#169832
description:
Há mais de 15 anos, a BairesDev® é líder em projetos tecnológicos. Entregamos soluções inovadoras para gigantes como Google e Rolls\-Royce e as startups mais inovadoras do Vale do Silício.
   

  

 Temos uma equipe diversa de mais de 4\.000 profissionais formada pelo Top 1% dos talentos de tecnologia do mundo, trabalhando remotamente em cargos de impacto global.
   

  

 Ao se candidatar para este cargo, você está dando o primeiro passo em um processo que vai além do comum. Nosso objetivo é alinhar suas paixões, habilidades, e expectativas às nossas vagas, colocando você no caminho para desenvolver uma carreira de sucesso excepcional.
   

  

 Tester de Software (QA) na BairesDev
   

  

 Buscamos excelentes Tester de Software (QA) para se juntarem à equipe de Pesquisa e Desenvolvimento (P\&D) da BairesDev. Nossa equipe de P\&D é uma parte essencial de nossas soluções de tecnologia que geram milhões em receita todos os anos, portanto, contratamos apenas os melhores entre os melhores.
   

  

 Dentro da equipe, você encontrará muitos desafios diferentes: análise de dados, machine learning, desktop e desenvolvimentos da web são alguns dos mais relevantes no momento, mas você perceberá que coisas novas surgem todos os dias para impulsionar a inovação, A área de P\&D é sem dúvida a área mais interessante e desafiadora de toda a empresa, e embora a BairesDev seja formada por pessoas realmente talentosas, aqui você encontrará profissionais com vasta experiência e também de nível intelectual e criativo, muito acima da média.
   

  

 Queremos gente que curta o desafio! Você está pronto?
   

  

**Responsabilidades**
* Analisar os requisitos do usuário final para definir e documentar os planos de teste.
* Executar casos de teste, depurar, detectar erros e / ou possíveis melhorias, documentar e fazer o acompanhamento para serem resolvidos.
* Gerar relatórios de resultados de testes e dos erros detectados.
* Definir prioridades e planejar testes de requisitos de sistema.
* Documentar as funcionalidades dos sistemas.
* Representar o usuário final para os desenvolvedores para garantir que os requisitos sejam atendidos.
* Detectar e propor melhorias tanto no processo de controle de qualidade quanto no ciclo de desenvolvimento de software.


**Habilidades e Experiência Desejadas**
* 4\+ anos de experiência em testes de Produtos Web.
* Sólidos conhecimentos em ferramentas de teste.
* Desenvolvimento de planos de teste: criação de casos de teste e depuração.
* Conhecimento adicional em tecnologias web.
* Amplo conhecimento em ambientes Unix e Linux.
* Nível avançado de inglês.


 Como tornamos seu trabalho (e sua vida) mais fácil:
   

  

* Modalidade 100% remota \- trabalhe de qualquer lugar.
* Excelente remuneração em USD ou na sua moeda local, como preferir.
* Hardware para você trabalhar de casa.
* Horários flexíveis \- faça seu próprio horário.
* Licença parental remunerada, férias, e feriados nacionais.
* Ambiente de trabalho inovador e multicultural.
* Colabore e aprenda com o Top 1% global dos talentos de cada área.
* Ambiente de apoio com mentoria, promoções, desenvolvimento de habilidades, e diversas oportunidades de crescimento.


 Junte\-se a uma equipe global onde seus talentos excepcionais podem se destacar!

title: R&D Engineer - Transformer Active part
description:
**Description**


For our HVDC Transformers research and development team we are looking for a R\&D mechanical engineer in the field of Transformer Active parttechnology. You will lead activities to improve transformer active part performance, design and manufacturing methods while challenging legacy routines and developing better suited concepts for the future. The role will cooperate closely with experts in different transformer technology fields as well as with transformer design and manufacturing specialists globally. You will build and maintain a network with the HVDC Transformer factories globally, collecting the inputs and supporting implementation of new development.


Working in R\&D will give you the possibility to use your creativity to solve a wide spectrum of challenges. You will have exciting and varied work in front of you where you will get a broad network internally and externally. Work with both the local factory and the global organization within Transformers and have career development opportunities as a Specialist or as a Project Manager.

**How you'll make an impact**

* Creating conceptual designs of Transformer active part to meet specified requirements (functional, technical, quality, etc).
* Ability to create detailed design and 3D modeling as well as running mechanical verifications using simulation tools.
* Running Design for Excellence practices (DFA, DFM, FMEA, etc.).
* Preparing reports and related documents in accordance with internal and external requirements.
* Technical standards: Ensure that active part\-related processes and calculation methods are state of the art. Work with programmers to implement and test new methods in the design software.
* Technical support: Support the design, manufacturing, quality and supply chain organizations with technical expertise to ensure that technical requirements are fulfilled.
* Technical leadership and knowledge sharing: Coach and provide support and technical advice to colleagues onactive part\-related topics. Maintain a network of engineering professionals to share best practices across different disciplines and the HVDC Transformer factories.

**Your background**

* Master’s or Bachelor’s degree combined with work\-life experience in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent.
* 3\+ Years of experience in Design \& Engineering.
* Domain expertise in Power transformers.
* Fundamental knowledge of using different materials and manufacturing methods.
* Understanding of electrical, magnetic and thermal phenomena.
* Advanced knowledge of 3D CAD software Creo/ProE.
* Fluent command of English, both written and spoken.
* Willingness to learn and try new things without fear of failure!

**What we offer**

* Collective agreement
* Flexible working time
* Health care and wellness allowance
* Fantastic career possibilities within Hitachi Energy both within Sweden and globally
* Mentor to support you throughout onboard phase
* Various trainings and education supporting employee development
* Diversified company with over 70\+ nationalities working in Sweden
* Supplementary compensation for parental leave
* Employee Benefit Portal with thousands of discounts and perks

**More about us**


Are you ready for an exciting new challenge? Does the above description sound like you? Applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis, so don’t delay – apply today!


Recruiting Manager Karolina Czechowski, karolina.czechowski@hitachienergy.com, will answer your questions about the position. title: WordPress Software Engineer
description:
**About MonetizeMore**
----------------------


MonetizeMore enables digital publishers to build sustainable businesses by maximizing their advertising revenue with privacy‑first, cutting‑edge ad tech. We are a fully remote, globally distributed team that values ownership, curiosity, and continuous improvement.

**The Role**
------------


We’re looking for a **Software Engineer (WordPress)** with strong **PHP** and **WordPress** experience to help us build, scale, and maintain high‑performance publisher sites and WordPress‑based products that integrate with our ad tech stack. You’ll collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers to ship features end‑to‑end in an agile, asynchronous environment.

### **What You’ll Do**

* Design, develop, and maintain custom WordPress plugins and themes using modern PHP.
* Build REST APIs and integrations with internal services and third‑party platforms (analytics, ad tech, SSO, etc.).
* Optimize performance (Core Web Vitals), security, and reliability across high‑traffic sites.
* Implement CI/CD pipelines, automated tests, and code quality tooling.
* Diagnose and resolve production issues; participate in an on‑call rotation (reasonable schedule, follow‑the‑sun).
* Partner with stakeholders to estimate effort, break down work, and deliver iterative value.
* Contribute to engineering standards, documentation, and knowledge sharing.

### **You’ll Thrive Here If You**

* Enjoy owning features from design to deployment.
* Communicate clearly in an async, remote‑first culture (Slack, docs, PRs).
* Care about developer experience, code quality, and maintainability.

**Qualifications**
------------------

**Must‑Haves**

* 2–3 years professional experience building WordPress sites, plugins, or products.
* Solid **PHP** (7\.x/8\.x) fundamentals and familiarity with modern patterns (OOP, namespaces, Composer, PSR standards).
* Strong WordPress expertise: hooks/filters, custom post types, WP‑CLI, multisite, Gutenberg/Block Editor.
* Frontend proficiency: HTML5, CSS/Sass, JavaScript/TypeScript, React for Gutenberg blocks.
* Experience with MySQL/MariaDB, query optimization, and caching (Object Cache/Redis, page caching).
* Git/GitHub (PR reviews, trunk‑based or GitFlow), CI/CD fundamentals.
* Performance and security best practices (Core Web Vitals, CWEs/OWASP, nonces/capabilities).
* Comfortable working across time zones in a remote team.

**Nice‑to‑Haves**

* Experience with ad tech (Google Ad Manager, Prebid, header bidding) or analytics (GA4, Looker Studio).
* Infrastructure experience: Docker, Nginx/Apache, Varnish, Cloudflare, AWS/GCP.
* Automated testing in the WP/PHP ecosystem (PHPUnit, Pest, Playwright, Cypress).
* Familiarity with SEO, internationalization (i18n/l10n), and accessibility (WCAG).
* Experience with telemetry/observability (Logrocket/Sentry, OpenTelemetry, Datadog/New Relic).

**Example Projects You Might Own**
----------------------------------

* Build a privacy‑aware custom plugin that injects ad placements conditionally based on consent signals (TCF/US Privacy) and viewability.
* Migrate legacy shortcodes to Gutenberg blocks with React and server‑side rendering for performance.
* Implement an edge‑cache strategy and object caching to reduce TTFB and improve LCP across high‑traffic pages.
* Create a small service that syncs WP content with internal APIs; expose a hardened REST endpoint for partners.

title: Engenheiro de processos - fábrica de estamparia
description:
Descrição:
* Ensino Superior completo em Engenharia de Processos e afins;
* Registro ativo no CREA;
* Experiência prévia com processos de estampagem automotiva, construção de moldes, parâmetros de equipamentos de processo e gerenciamento de manutenção de rotina de moldes;
* Inglês intermediário para conversação;
* Proficiência em AutoCAD
* Disponibilidade para atuar presencialmente em Camaçari/BA.

  

* Responsável pelo planejamento das atividades de introdução pré\-molde para modelos de veículos, preparação dos elementos do processo no local e condições das instalações, facilitação da comunicação entre departamentos em relação aos preparativos pré\-chegada e identificação de riscos relacionados ao molde.
* Estabelecer parâmetros de processo durante a depuração do molde, participar na verificação do estado da qualidade das peças e na análise de problemas.
* Gerenciar anomalias na produção do molde, desenvolver planos de reparo, revisar protocolos de manutenção do molde, resolver problemas de produção e garantir a resolução de problemas em ciclo fechado.
* Preparar cartões de processo de produção experimental e documentação formal do processo, orientando o pessoal de produção por meio de treinamento relacionado ao processo e instruções de fluxo de trabalho.
* Participar das revisões do layout do processo da linha de produção e do esquema de fluxo de trabalho, verificando a precisão dos parâmetros dos equipamentos do processo.
* Supervisionar os preparativos para modificações no molde devido a alterações na engenharia do produto, reparos externos no molde, comunicação técnica com fornecedores externos de moldes e avaliações do inventário de moldes.
* Revisar as cotas de consumo de materiais auxiliares do molde e gerenciar os custos associados.
* Manter e atualizar as listas de materiais do processo, gerenciar os processos de alteração ECR do molde e implementar melhorias no processo.
* Supervisionar a validação do processo para novos materiais de moldes, avaliar novas propostas de ferramentas e gerenciar testes de materiais, trocas e procedimentos de transferência.
* Realizar treinamentos básicos e técnicos de rotina para o pessoal de reparo de moldes e verificar a compatibilidade dos componentes padrão e não padrão de reparo de moldes.
* Revisar desenhos estruturais de moldes, antecipar e resolver proativamente os desafios de produção e demonstrar proficiência em UG/AutoCAD e aplicativos de software de escritório.

title: Data Engineer - Remote, Latin America
description:
Bluelight Consulting is a leading software consultancy dedicated to designing and developing innovative technology that enhances users' lives. With a steadfast commitment to delivering exceptional service to our clients, Bluelight excels in its focus on quality and customer satisfaction. Our mission is not only to create cutting\-edge applications but also to foster a collaborative and enriching work environment where each team member can grow and thrive. With a presence across the United States and Central/South America, Bluelight is in an exciting phase of expansion, continually seeking exceptional talent to join its dynamic and diverse community.  

We are looking for a skilled individual to join our rapidly growing team at Bluelight Consulting. This position is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast\-paced, dynamic environment where everyone's opinions and efforts are valued and appreciated. You will have the opportunity to contribute to challenging and meaningful projects, developing high\-quality applications that stand out in the market. We value continuous learning, personal growth, and hard work, offering a collaborative environment that promotes professional development. If you are passionate about software development and eager to be part of a growing software consultancy, we invite you to apply and join us on this exciting journey.
### **What we are looking for**

* + Experience with AWS services including but not limited to S3, Athena, EC2, EMR, and Glue.
	+ Ability to solve any ongoing issues with operating the cluster.
	+ Experience with the integration of data from multiple data sources.
	+ Experience with various database technologies such as SQLServer, Redshift, Postgres, and RDS.
	+ Experience with one or more of the following data integration platforms: Pentaho Kettle, SnapLogic, Talend OpenStudio, Jitterbit, Informatica PowerCenter, or similar.
	+ Knowledge of best practices and IT operations in an always\-up, always\-available service.
	+ Experience with or knowledge of Agile Software Development methodologies.
	+ Excellent problem\-solving and troubleshooting skills.
	+ Excellent oral and written communication skills with a keen sense of customer service.
	+ Experience with collecting/managing/reporting on large data stores.
	+ Awareness of Data governance and data quality principles.
	+ Well\-versed in Business Analytics including basic metric building and troubleshooting.
	+ Understand Integration architecture: application integration and data flow diagrams, source\-to\-target mappings, data dictionary reports.
	+ Familiar with Web Services: XML, REST, SOAP.
	+ Experience with Git or similar version control software.
	+ Experience with integrations with and/or use of BI tools such as GoodData (preferred), Tableau, PowerBI, or similar.
	+ Broad experience with multiple RDBMS: MS SQLServer, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redshift.
	+ Familiarity with SaaS/cloud data systems (e.g. Salesforce).
	+ Data warehouse design: star\-schemas, change data capture, denormalization.
	+ SQL/DDL queries/Tuning techniques such as indexing, sorting, and distribution.
	+ BS or MS degree in Computer Science or a related technical field.
	+ 3\+ years of Data Pipeline development such as SnapLogic or Datastage, Informatica, or related experience.
	+ 3\+ years of SQL experience (No\-SQL experience is a plus).
	+ Experience designing, building, and maintaining data pipelines.

### **What you'll be doing**

* + Develop and maintain data models for core package application and reporting databases to describe objects and fields for support documentation and to facilitate custom application development and data integration.
	+ Monitoring execution and performance of daily pipelines, triage and escalate any issues.
	+ Collaborates with analytics and business teams to improve data models and data pipelines that feed business intelligence tools, increasing data accessibility and fostering data\-driven decision\-making across the organization.
	+ Implements processes and systems to monitor data quality, ensuring production data is always accurate and available for key stakeholders and business processes.
	+ Writes unit/integration tests, contributes to engineering wiki, and documents work.
	+ Performs data analysis required to troubleshoot data\-related issues and assist in the resolution of data issues.
	+ Work within AWS/Linux cloud systems environment in support of data integration solution
	+ Works closely with a team of frontend and backend engineers, product managers, and analysts.
	+ Teamwork: Collaborate with team members. Share knowledge, provide visibility of interpersonal accomplishments and follow directions when provided.

### **Company Benefits**

* + Competitive salary and bonuses, including performance\-based salary increases.
	+ Generous paid\-time\-off policy
	+ Flexible working hours
	+ Work remotely
	+ Continuing education, training, conferences
	+ Company\-sponsored coursework, exams, and certifications

Being a consultant in our team is a fun, challenging, and rewarding career choice. Your contributions are highly valued by clients, and the work you do often has a direct and significant impact on their business.  

You will have the opportunity to work on a variety of projects for our incredible clients, which will accelerate your career growth. You’ll collaborate with modern technologies and work alongside some of the best professionals in the industry!  

If you’re eager to be part of an exciting, challenging, and rapidly growing consultancy, we encourage you to apply. \#LI\-Remote

title: Hardware Test Engineer - Mechanics
description:
**Why join us**
 TRACTIAN is transforming the industrial world by empowering frontline maintenance workers to achieve more. We’ve fused cutting\-edge hardware with innovative software into one powerful platform, disrupting legacy systems and delivering smarter, faster solutions for our clients.
   

  

 At TRACTIAN, you'll break boundaries, question convention, and collaborate with top talent to drive real change. As a part of our growth\-stage startup, you’ll work alongside the founders, shaping the vision, products, and experiences that will define the future of industrial tech.
   

  

**Hardware at TRACTIAN**
 The Hardware team is responsible for designing and improving our IoT devices, dealing with every step of the development process, ranging from PCB design, firmware programming, case design, validations and certifications, always aiming to build trustworthy products that can be produced at a mass scale.
   

  

**What Will You Do**
 As a Hardware Test Engineer specializing in Mechanics, you will be responsible for testing and validating the mechanical reliability of our IoT devices. What does that entail? Designing and executing validation plans, simulating real\-world stresses, ensuring durability and compliance, and troubleshooting mechanical failures are all part of your mission. Your end goal is to help Tractian deliver devices that are robust, reliable, and ready for the toughest industrial environments.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and execute detailed mechanical test plans, including stress, vibration, shock, drop, and thermal cycling tests.
* Simulate real\-world conditions using test rigs, hydraulic actuators, and environmental chambers to evaluate product endurance.
* Use precision instruments (calipers, strain gauges, accelerometers) to collect and analyze accurate test data.
* Identify mechanical failures, perform root\-cause analysis, and collaborate with design engineers to propose improvements.
* Design and implement test routines for validating mechanical robustness of electronic hardware.
* Maintain comprehensive documentation of testing procedures, results, and insights.
* Ensure calibration, maintenance, and correct operation of all testing equipment.
* Stay up to date with testing methodologies, reliability engineering practices, and industry standards.


 ,
 **Requirements**
* 3\+ years of experience in mechanical testing, validation, and failure analysis for electronic devices.
* Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Mechatronics, or related field.
* Hands\-on experience with accelerated life testing (HALT, HASS, ALT) and environmental stress screening.
* Proficiency with vibration, shock, drop, thermal cycling, humidity, tensile/compression, and fatigue testing.
* Familiarity with CAD/CAE tools (SolidWorks, Creo, CATIA, ANSYS) for designing jigs and test equipment. Structural, thermal, and dynamic simulations are a plus.
* Knowledge of materials science, fatigue behavior, and thermal–mechanical reliability of electronic devices.
* Ability to interpret engineering drawings, GD\&T, and material specifications.


 ,
 **Bonus Points**
* Experience with DFx methodologies (Design for Reliability, Test, Manufacturability).
* Background in electro\-mechanical systems and material compatibility testing.
* Familiarity with international testing standards (IEC, ISO, MIL\-STD, ASTM).
* Experience automating test setups with scripting languages (Python, LabVIEW, TestStand).
* Contributions to hardware R\&D projects or open\-source engineering communities.


**Compensation:**
* Competitive salary and stock options
* 30 days of paid annual leave
* Education and courses stipend
* Earn a trip anywhere in the world every 4 years
* R$1\.035/month for meals allowance
* Health plan with national coverage and without coparticipation
* Dental Insurance: we help you with dental treatment for a better quality of life.
* Gympass and Sports Incentive: R$300/mo extra if you practice activities

title: QA Engineer Specialist
description:

* Excellent **oral and written communication skills**, with the ability to clearly convey technical information to both technical and non\-technical stakeholders.

* A **quality\-driven mindset** with a passion for improving processes, preventing defects, and enhancing overall system reliability.
* Deep understanding of **cloud deployments**, **release management**, **environment management**, and proven experience optimizing production deployments.

* + Frontend using React
	+ Backend using Python Web Frameworks (Flask, Django, FastAPI, etc.)
	+ Data Management Systems (PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Cassandra, Kafka, etc.)

**Project Overview \& Deliverables:**
